analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni mu gsum bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that it is not included in the three modes of phenomena explained in the above three alternatives.

original: 'di lta ste nyon mongs pa can gyi chos dag ni dge ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste nyon mongs pa can gyi chos dag ni dge ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: For example, afflicted phenomena are not a homogeneous cause of virtuous phenomena

original: mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are dissimilar.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dang dge ba rnams ni nyon @212b mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang dge ba rnams ni nyon @212b mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, and because virtues are not afflicted, they are not omnipresent causes.

original: de bzhin du dge ba rnams nyon mongs pa can dag gi ma yin pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba rnams nyon mongs pa can dag gi ma yin pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Similarly, virtues are not the homogeneous cause of afflicted states.

original: nyon mongs pa can dag kyang nyon mongs can rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can dag kyang nyon mongs can rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
translated: Afflicted states are not the homogeneous cause of afflicted states.

original: kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
translated: They are not omnipresent causes.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni ris gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ris gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni ris gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ris gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
translated: attachment and so on are not the homogeneous cause of afflicted states of other types because they belong to different types.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
translated: They are not omnipresent causes because attachment and so on are not omnipresent.

original: kun du 'gro ba'i chos dag kyang ris gcig pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba'i chos dag kyang ris gcig pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma yin la /
translated: Also, omnipresent phenomena are not the homogeneous cause of afflicted states of the same type.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the cause of all because

original: gal te de dag ma 'ongs pa yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gal te de dag ma 'ongs pa yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: if they are future, they are not yet present.

original: bral ba'i blo yis zad pa'o //
analyzed: bral ba'i blo yis zad pa'o //
translated: It is cessation obtained by the mind of separation.

original: zhes bya ba ni blos thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni blos thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that cessation that is obtained by the mind is the result of separation.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rgyu des na ste /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rgyu des na ste /
translated: Therefore means by that cause.

original: gang gi phyir zad pa ni 'gog pa yin la blo de ni shes rab yin pa'i rgyu des ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro zhes ston te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zad pa ni 'gog pa yin la blo de ni shes rab yin pa'i rgyu des ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro zhes ston te /
translated: Because cessation is exhaustion and that mind is wisdom, it is taught that analytical cessation is the result of separation.üîΩThat which arises by the power of thatüîΩis the result of conscious effort.

original: gang gi stobs kyis gang skye ba //üîΩzhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gang gi stobs ni /üîΩgang gis stobs so zhes drug par tshig bsdus te /
analyzed: gang gi stobs kyis gang skye ba // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gang gi stobs ni / gang gis stobs so zhes drug par tshig bsdus te /
translated: That which arises by the power of thatüîΩis the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.

original: gang gi stobs kyis 'dus byas gang skye ba'i 'bras bu de ni de'i skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi stobs kyis 'dus byas gang skye ba'i 'bras bu de ni de'i skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa yin no //
translated: That which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThat which arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort

original: skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa ni skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa ni skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa ste /
translated: That arisen from the person is the result of conscious effort.üîΩIt is the result of conscious effort.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is called the result of conscious effort.

original: dper brjod pa ston par byed de /
analyzed: dper brjod pa ston par byed de /
translated: An example is given.üîΩFor example, the result of the mind of preparation of a desire realm being is the concentration of the first absorption or the second absorption level of the higher realm.üîΩThe result of conscious effort is to be applied in this context.üîΩAlso, the mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.

original: dper nas 'og ma pa 'dod pa na spyod pa de'i sbyor ba'i sems kyi 'bras bu sa gong ma pa bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa 'am bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu ste skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa zhes bya bar skabsüîΩdang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dper nas 'og ma pa 'dod pa na spyod pa de'i sbyor ba'i sems kyi 'bras bu sa gong ma pa bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa 'am bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu ste skyes bu byed pa las skyes pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the form realm is the result of conscious effort.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i zag pa med pa dang bsam gtan gyi sems can sems kyi sprul pa'i sems kyang 'bras bu de kho na @213a * //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i zag pa med pa dang bsam gtan gyi sems can sems kyi sprul pa'i sems kyang 'bras bu de kho na @213a * //
translated: The mind of emanation of the formless realm is the result of conscious effort.üîΩThe mind of emanation of the desire realm

original: yin no / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzhan yang dper na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chi ba'i sems las gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma dang po lta bu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: yin no / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzhan yang dper na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chi ba'i sems las gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma dang po lta bu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: So too, for example, the first moment of the intermediate existence of the form realm arises from the mind of death of the desire realm.

original: ris mi mthun pa dper brjod pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bstsal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: ris mi mthun pa dper brjod pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bstsal ba'i phyir te /
translated: The example of dissimilar type is stated to exclude the result of natural outflow.

original: sa tha dad pa ni rgyu dang 'dra ba ma yin pas sa gong ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang sa 'og ma pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma yin la /
analyzed: sa tha dad pa ni rgyu dang 'dra ba ma yin pas sa gong ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang sa 'og ma pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma yin la /
translated: Since different levels are not similar to their causes, the meditative attainment of a higher level is not the result of natural outflow of the mind of preparation of a lower level.

original: zag pa med pa yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: And uncontaminated states are not the result of natural outflow of contaminated states.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu thams cad skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu thams cad skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Not all results of natural outflow are results of conscious effort.

original: gang zhig gang gi stobs kyis skye zhing 'dra ba dang sa mtshungs pa dang de ma thag pa yin pa de ni de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi stobs kyis skye zhing 'dra ba dang sa mtshungs pa dang de ma thag pa yin pa de ni de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la /
translated: That which arises by the power of something and is similar to it, is of the same stage, and is immediately antecedent is the active result of that.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yang yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yang yin no //
translated: It is also the result that resembles its cause.

original: 'di la mu bzhi par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la mu bzhi par yang 'gyur te /
translated: There are four possibilities here.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is that which is only an active result and not a result that resembles its cause.

original: ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //üîΩrgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o // rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la /
translated: For example, as previously explained.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is that which is only a result that resembles its cause and not an active result.

original: skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu bar du chod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu bar du chod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the interrupted result of homogeneous and omnipresent causes.

original: gnyi ga yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: gnyi ga yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is that which is both.

original: skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu de ma thag tu 'byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu de ma thag tu 'byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the immediately arising result of homogeneous and omnipresent causes.

original: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is that which is neither.

original: dper na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the result of the cause of karmic maturation is karmic maturation.

original: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin par ni 'dod mod kyi /
analyzed: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin par ni 'dod mod kyi /
translated: Although cessation due to deliberation is also the result of conscious effort,

original: rtag pa'i phyir 'di rgyu'i stobs kyis skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa'i phyir 'di rgyu'i stobs kyis skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not produced by the power of a cause because it is permanent.

original: de'i phyir tshig le'ur byas pa las ma bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshig le'ur byas pa las ma bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is not mentioned in the verse.

original: de nye bar sbyar ba'i phyir so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni gang gi stobs kyis 'thob pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos ste //
analyzed: de nye bar sbyar ba'i phyir so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni gang gi stobs kyis 'thob pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos ste //
translated: In order to apply that, it should be said, ‚ÄúCessation due to deliberation is obtained by the power of that.‚Äù

original: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis 'thob ste /
analyzed: so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis 'thob ste /
translated: Cessation due to deliberation is obtained by the power of deliberation.

original: de lta bas na so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa skyes bu byed pa'i @213b 'bras bu yin no //üîΩsngon byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de lta bas na so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa skyes bu byed pa'i @213b 'bras bu yin no // sngon byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Therefore, cessation due to deliberation is the result of conscious effort.üîΩIt is not prior, etc.

original: sngon byung ma yin pa ni sngar byung ba las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: sngon byung ma yin pa ni sngar byung ba las gzhan pa'o //
translated: Prior means that which occurs earlier.

original: de gang zhe na lhan cig 'byung ba dang phyis 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de gang zhe na lhan cig 'byung ba dang phyis 'byung ba ste /
translated: What are they? They are coemergent and subsequent.

original: 'bras bu snga la rgyu 'phyi ba ni med do //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga la rgyu 'phyi ba ni med do //
translated: There is no result that precedes its cause.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos kho na bdag po'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos kho na bdag po'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: Only conditioned phenomena are dominant results.

original: 'dus ma byas ni ma yin no //üîΩ'dus byas kho na'i yin gyi 'dus ma byas kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni ma yin no // 'dus byas kho na'i yin gyi 'dus ma byas kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: Unconditioned phenomena are not.

original: 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang smin pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang smin pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Only conditioned phenomena are dominant results, not unconditioned phenomena, because they lack the power to hold and ripen results.

original: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa dang bgegs mi byed pa'i dngos por gnas pa'i yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa dang bgegs mi byed pa'i dngos por gnas pa'i yang ngo //
translated: All means that which is a producer and that which abides as a nonobstructing entity.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po'i yin no zhes bya ba ni /üîΩgang gi stobs kyi gang skye ba'i //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po'i yin no zhes bya ba ni / gang gi stobs kyi gang skye ba'i //
translated: The result of conscious effort is of the agent.

original: 'bras de skyes bu byed las skye //
analyzed: 'bras de skyes bu byed las skye //
translated: The result that arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩbdag po'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i yang yin te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // bdag po'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i yang yin te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúWhatever arises by the power of that is the result of conscious effort.‚ÄùüîΩThe dominant result is of that which is not the agent.

original: sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni //
analyzed: sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni //
translated: Unconditioned phenomena are not results of conscious effort.

original: 'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras //üîΩzhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The dominant result of only conditioned states.üîΩThe dominant result of other states is only the dominant result.

original: gzhan dag gi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni bzo de bzo bo ma yin pa bgegs mi byed pa'i dngos por gnas pa rnams kyi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin gyi skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni ma yin
analyzed: gzhan dag gi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni bzo de bzo bo ma yin pa bgegs mi byed pa'i dngos por gnas pa rnams kyi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin gyi skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni ma yin
translated: The result of the action of a craft is only the dominant result of those who are not the agent of the craft, since they exist as nonobstructing entities.üîΩThus four possibilities exist:

original: no // de ltar na mu bzhi par 'gyur te skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la bdag po'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: no // de ltar na mu bzhi par 'gyur te skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin la bdag po'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is an action that is only the result of conscious effort and not the dominant result.

original: dper na bral ba'i 'bras bu lta bu'o //üîΩbdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin la /
analyzed: dper na bral ba'i 'bras bu lta bu'o // bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin la /
translated: For example, the result of separation.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is an action that is only the dominant result.

original: rgyu yal bar 'dug pa'i 'bras bu dang 'bras bu bar du chod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu yal bar 'dug pa'i 'bras bu dang 'bras bu bar du chod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the result of a cause that has ceased or the result of a cause that is distant.

original: gnyi ga yin pa yang yod do //
analyzed: gnyi ga yin pa yang yod do //
translated: There is an action that is both.

original: rgyu byed pa po'i lhan cig 'byung ba dang de ma thag tu byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu byed pa po'i lhan cig 'byung ba dang de ma thag tu byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the result of a cause that is a coemergent or immediately preceding cause.üîΩThere is an action that is neither.

original: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is also a fourth alternative that is neither.

original: dper na nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa lta bu'o //üîΩlnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa lta bu'o // lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin //
translated: For example, space and nonanalytical cessation.üîΩThe five that are present possess results.üîΩThe present ones alone possess results.

original: zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dag kho na 'bras bu 'dzin to zhes bya bar nges par bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dag kho na 'bras bu 'dzin to zhes bya bar nges par bzung ba yin no //
translated: This is the definite enumeration.

original: 'dzin zhes bya ba ni 'phen par byed pa ste /üîΩsa bon gyi @214a * //üîΩdngos por nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dzin zhes bya ba ni 'phen par byed pa ste / sa bon gyi @214a * // dngos por nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: To possess means to project.üîΩThe present ones project their results.

original: byed rgyu'i rgyu yang de dang 'dra mod kyi zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi kho na 'bras bu 'dzin gyi 'das pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: byed rgyu'i rgyu yang de dang 'dra mod kyi zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi kho na 'bras bu 'dzin gyi 'das pa yang ma yin la /
translated: The present ones alone possess results.

original: ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi /
translated: The past ones do not, nor do the future ones.

original: de ni 'bras bu dang bcas par ma nges pas ma brjod do //
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu dang bcas par ma nges pas ma brjod do //
translated: But it is not definite that the past and future possess results.üîΩTherefore they are not mentioned.

original: 'di ltar 'dus ma byas kyang byed rgyu'i rgyu yin par 'dod mod kyi 'di la 'bras bu ni med la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dus ma byas kyang byed rgyu'i rgyu yin par 'dod mod kyi 'di la 'bras bu ni med la /
translated: Although unconditioned states are asserted to be active causes, they do not have results.

original: ma 'ongs pa yang byed rgyu'i rgyu yin mod kyi sngar byung ba'i chos kyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yang byed rgyu'i rgyu yin mod kyi sngar byung ba'i chos kyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although future states are also active causes, they are not active causes of past states that possess results.

original: gnyis pa ni 'byin par byed ces bya ba ni da ltar gyi dag ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar te /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni 'byin par byed ces bya ba ni da ltar gyi dag ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar te /
translated: The second is the present states.üîΩCoemergent and concomitant causes produce results only in the present.üîΩIf they are past, they are causes.üîΩIf they are future, they are active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag ni da ltar kho na 'bras bu 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag ni da ltar kho na 'bras bu 'byin par byed do //
translated: If they are present, they are causes and active causes.

original: re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs na zhes bya ba ni 'di gnyis ni /üîΩrgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i //
analyzed: re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs na zhes bya ba ni 'di gnyis ni / rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i //
translated: If they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus 'bras bu dang bcas pa dag tu bshad na /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus 'bras bu dang bcas pa dag tu bshad na /
translated: If they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.üîΩIf they are present, they are causes and active causes.

original: da ltar gyi dag go rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byin te da ltar gyi gnas skabs na ni de gnyis kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu mi snang ngo zhe na /üîΩsmras pa / mjug thogs su bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dag go rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byin te da ltar gyi gnas skabs na ni de gnyis kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu mi snang ngo zhe na /üîΩsmras pa / mjug thogs su bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
translated: If they are present, they

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: 'bras bu 'byin pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byin pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is the expression ‚Äúto yield a result.‚Äù

original: de dag kyang 'das pa yin zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag 'grogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'das pa yin zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag 'grogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And they are past means that cause and effect do not coexist.

original: yang de nyid mi 'byin to zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyi gnas skabs kho nar phyung zin pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu de nyid 'byin par ni mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang de nyid mi 'byin to zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyi gnas skabs kho nar phyung zin pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu de nyid 'byin par ni mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: And it does not yield that very result again means that it does not yield that very same result again, because it has already yielded it in that state.

original: da ltar nyid du khyer te 'ongs zin pa ni yang bskur bar mi nus so //üîΩgang gi tshe de gnyis 'das pas 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa na yang de kho na'i tshe rang gi 'bras bu de 'byin par byed de skye ba'i gnas skabs kho nar 'bras bu sgrub par byed kyi /
analyzed: da ltar nyid du khyer te 'ongs zin pa ni yang bskur bar mi nus so // gang gi tshe de gnyis 'das pas 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa na yang de kho na'i tshe rang gi 'bras bu de 'byin par byed de skye ba'i gnas skabs kho nar 'bras bu sgrub par byed kyi /
translated: That which has been brought to the present cannot be sent again.üîΩWhen those two yield a result in the past, they yield that very result in that state alone.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin la /
translated: They establish their result in the state of arising alone, not in another.

original: 'bras bu de ni bsgribs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ni bsgribs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: And that result is merely obscured.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: The last obtainment of all is severed by severing the root of virtue.

original: dge @214b ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni rim gyis kun du 'chad do //
analyzed: dge @214b ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni rim gyis kun du 'chad do //
translated: The root of virtue is severed in stages.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: log par lta ba ni chung ngu'i chung ngu nas chen po'i chen po'i bar rnam pa dgu yin la /
analyzed: log par lta ba ni chung ngu'i chung ngu nas chen po'i chen po'i bar rnam pa dgu yin la /
translated: Wrong view has nine levels, from small-small to great-great.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rnam pa dgu yin no /üîΩ// / bam po nyi shu pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rnam pa dgu yin no / // / bam po nyi shu pa /
translated: The roots of virtue also have nine levels.

original: de la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du bzlog ste /
analyzed: de la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du bzlog ste /
translated: The roots of virtue are severed in the reverse order of the afflictions that are objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: log par lta ba chung ngu'i chung ngus ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po rnams kun du 'chad par 'gyur ba nas log par lta ba chen po'i chen po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i chung ngu rnams kun du 'chad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro
analyzed: log par lta ba chung ngu'i chung ngus ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po rnams kun du 'chad par 'gyur ba nas log par lta ba chen po'i chen po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i chung ngu rnams kun du 'chad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro
translated: Wrong view of small-small level severs the roots of virtue of great-great level, up to wrong view of great-great level severs the roots of virtue of small-small level.

original: // de la tha ma'i gnas skabs na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i chung ngu rnams ni kun du mi 'byung gi de dag gi thob pa chung ngu'i chung ngu dag ni kun du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: // de la tha ma'i gnas skabs na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i chung ngu rnams ni kun du mi 'byung gi de dag gi thob pa chung ngu'i chung ngu dag ni kun du 'byung ngo //
translated: At the end, the smallest of the small roots of good do not occur, but the acquisition of the smallest of the small roots of good occurs.

original: de'i tshe thams cad kyi tha ma de dag 'dor ba ni thob pa de dag gi thob pa 'gag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i tshe thams cad kyi tha ma de dag 'dor ba ni thob pa de dag gi thob pa 'gag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: At that time, when they are discarded, the acquisition of those acquisitions is stopped.

original: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu tha ma'i gnas skabs kyi thob pa de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed cing 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin par byed kyi bskyed par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir rang gi rgyu mthun pa'i
analyzed: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu tha ma'i gnas skabs kyi thob pa de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed cing 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin par byed kyi bskyed par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir rang gi rgyu mthun pa'i
translated: The acquisition of the smallest of the small roots of good, which is the homogeneous cause of the good, holds the result and possesses the result, but it does not produce the result, because there is no other moment of good to be produced.

original: 'bras bu 'byin par ni mi byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byin par ni mi byed do //
translated: It does not produce the result that is its natural outflow.

original: mu gnyis pa ni 'byin par byed la 'dzin par mi byed pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mu gnyis pa ni 'byin par byed la 'dzin par mi byed pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The second possibility is that which produces but does not hold.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nying mtshams sbyor bas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ni thams cad kyi sngon du 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nying mtshams sbyor bas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ni thams cad kyi sngon du 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o //
translated: Those that are obtained first of all by the linking of the roots of virtue are those that are obtained first of all.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed cing rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'thob pa skyed par byed kyi /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed cing rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'thob pa skyed par byed kyi /
translated: Those homogeneous causes of the roots of virtue produce a result and generate obtainment that is similar to its cause.

original: sngar nyid bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par ni mi byed do //
analyzed: sngar nyid bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par ni mi byed do //
translated: But they do not generate obtainment that was previously obtained.

original: mu gnyis pa bstan pa 'di ni skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: mu gnyis pa bstan pa 'di ni skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: The second possibility that is presented is flawed.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char gyi yang 'thob pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dag mnyam du 'thob par 'gyur la /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char gyi yang 'thob pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dag mnyam du 'thob par 'gyur la /
translated: When linking with the roots of virtue, one obtains the nine types of roots of virtue in the past, present and future simultaneously.

original: de dag las dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'das pa'i thob pa gang dag yin pa de ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed kyi bzung zin pa'i @215a * //
analyzed: de dag las dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'das pa'i thob pa gang dag yin pa de ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed kyi bzung zin pa'i @215a * //
translated: The obtainment of past virtuous homogeneous causes that have already yielded their result does not again cause the obtainment of that result.

original: phyir 'dzin par ni mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di rigs na /
analyzed: phyir 'dzin par ni mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di rigs na /
translated: If this is reasonable,

original: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu da ltar gyi thob pa de dang 'dra ba kho nar thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ji ltar 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dmigs kyisüîΩbsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu da ltar gyi thob pa de dang 'dra ba kho nar thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ji ltar 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dmigs kyis bsal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then why is it not observed that the obtainment of present virtuous homogeneous causes is just like that, that is, that it yields its result but does not cause obtainment?

original: de ni 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: Obtainment is both that which causes obtainment and that which yields its result.

original: de ltar na khyad par du ma byas pa'i mu gnyis pa bstan pa 'di ni skyon dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na khyad par du ma byas pa'i mu gnyis pa bstan pa 'di ni skyon dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Thus the second alternative, which is not distinguished in this way, is faulty.üîΩObjection: What is the purpose of the obtainment of obtainment?

original: de lta bas na slob dpon gyis 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na slob dpon gyis 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore the master Vasubandhu says, ‚ÄúIt is said that they alone are the homogeneous cause that produces results.‚Äù

original: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu thob pa de dag ni rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu thob pa de dag ni rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: Those who obtain virtuous homogeneous causes are those who produce results because they yield results that are similar to their cause.

original: sngar bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But they do not hold results because they have already obtained them.

original: mu gsum pa ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin pa ste /
analyzed: mu gsum pa ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin pa ste /
translated: The third possibility is that which holds results but does not produce results.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du ma 'chad pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod pas thob pa gang dag thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba dang / gnas skabs gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor bas thob pa gang dag thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa'i gnas skabs gnyis ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du ma 'chad pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod pas thob pa gang dag thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba dang / gnas skabs gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor bas thob pa gang dag thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa'i gnas skabs gnyis ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: The two states when the roots of virtue are severed are the state when all obtainments are discarded at the end and the state when all obtainments are obtained at the beginning.

original: dper na bdag cag la sogs pa'i dge ba'i thob pa dag lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na bdag cag la sogs pa'i dge ba'i thob pa dag lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the obtainment of virtue in our own and other continuums.

original: 'bras bu 'dzin par yang byed la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dzin par yang byed la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: It is both that which holds the result and that which projects the result.

original: skal ba mi mnyam pa'i skad cig ma gzhan gyis bar du ma chod pa zhes brjod par bya dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: skal ba mi mnyam pa'i skad cig ma gzhan gyis bar du ma chod pa zhes brjod par bya dgos so zhe na /
translated: It is said that it is not obstructed by other moments of different type.

original: brjod par bya mi dgos te /
analyzed: brjod par bya mi dgos te /
translated: It is not necessary to say that.

original: thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i skad cig ma gzhan gyis bar du chod kyang 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i skad cig ma gzhan gyis bar du chod kyang 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The obtainment of homogeneous causes that are characteristics is sometimes an effect that is held and sometimes an effect that is emitted, because it is possible that it is obstructed by other dissimilar moments.

original: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: The fourth is that which is not included in those three.

original: dper na sa gong ma las yongs su @215b nyams pa'i dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par yang mi byed la /
analyzed: dper na sa gong ma las yongs su @215b nyams pa'i dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par yang mi byed la /
translated: For example, the obtainment of roots of virtue of the higher realm that are homogeneous causes of virtue that have degenerated from the higher realm does not hold its effect because it was previously obtained.

original: sa de las yongs su nyams pa la sa de pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams kyi thob pa med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sa de las yongs su nyams pa la sa de pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams kyi thob pa med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not emitted because those who degenerate from that realm do not possess the obtainment of roots of virtue of that realm.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa'i gnas skabs la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa'i gnas skabs la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be stated for the period of severing the roots of virtue.

original: 'di la slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rung ba ma yin no //
translated: Master Sa·πÉghabhadra says that it is not correct to say that they are the homogeneous cause of those that connect to the intermediate existence and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩnying mtshams sbyor bar byed pas thams cad kyi dang por thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi tha mar bor pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par ma zad kyi de ni de'i thob pa'i rgyu
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pas thams cad kyi dang por thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi tha mar bor pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par ma zad kyi de ni de'i thob pa'i rgyu
translated: Why?

original: sngon rol du 'gags pa'i yang rgyu mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon rol du 'gags pa'i yang rgyu mthun pa yin no //
translated: The first obtainment of those that connect to the intermediate existence and so on is not only the result of natural outflow of those that are last, it is also the result of natural outflow of those that have ceased previously.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni ci nas kyang 'bras bu yin par smos pas zad par de'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur bsdus pa nyid du 'gyur snyam du de kho na'i phyir brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni ci nas kyang 'bras bu yin par smos pas zad par de'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur bsdus pa nyid du 'gyur snyam du de kho na'i phyir brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, he says that this is stated in order to include the obtainment of those that connect to the intermediate existence and so on as the homogeneous cause of those that are last, since it is definitely a result.

original: de lta bas na ji ltar bkod pa nyid legs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na ji ltar bkod pa nyid legs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, he says that the order in which they are listed is correct.

original: de ltar gnyi ga la yang tshig gi skyon brjod na /
analyzed: de ltar gnyi ga la yang tshig gi skyon brjod na /
translated: If you say that both are faulty,

original: tshig gang zhig bzang zhe na /
analyzed: tshig gang zhig bzang zhe na /
translated: then which words are good?

original: 'dir ni chos mngon pa las byung ba kho na bzang ngo zhes bya bar blta'o //üîΩdge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i chos thob pa da ltar gyi thob pa dag 'bras bu 'byin par yang byed la 'dzin par yang byed kyi /
analyzed: 'dir ni chos mngon pa las byung ba kho na bzang ngo zhes bya bar blta'o // dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i chos thob pa da ltar gyi thob pa dag 'bras bu 'byin par yang byed la 'dzin par yang byed kyi /
translated: Here, only those that occur in the Abhidharma are good.

original: 'byin par byed pa kho na yin la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin pas khyad par du ma byas pa'i phyir nyes so zhes bshad pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'byin par byed pa kho na yin la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin pas khyad par du ma byas pa'i phyir nyes so zhes bshad pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Objection: Isn‚Äôt it explained that it is faulty to not specify that the present obtainment of the factors conducive to virtue also generates and maintains its result?

original: de ni nyes pa med de /
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med de /
translated: Reply: There is no fault because

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nying mtshams sbyor bas zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa skye bar chas pa'i gnas skabs kho nar brjod pa yin gyi da ltar gyi gnas skabs su ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nying mtshams sbyor bas zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa skye bar chas pa'i gnas skabs kho nar brjod pa yin gyi da ltar gyi gnas skabs su ni ma yin no //
translated: this statement that the factors conducive to virtue are obtained refers only to the state of preparation for generating the roots of virtue, it does not refer to the present state.

original: de na ni da ltar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thob pa dag 'ga' yang med na ji ltar de dag 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin @216a * //
analyzed: de na ni da ltar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thob pa dag 'ga' yang med na ji ltar de dag 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin @216a * //
translated: If the obtainment of roots of virtue that exist in the present do not exist in the least, how could they be that which seizes the result and that which generates the result?

original: par byed pa yang yin zhes brjod par nus /
analyzed: par byed pa yang yin zhes brjod par nus /
translated: How could it be said that they are that which seizes the result and that which generates the result?üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.

original: rang gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thob pa skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'das pa dag ni thams cad kyang de'i tshe de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i tshul gyis rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi sngon bzungüîΩzin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thob pa skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'das pa dag ni thams cad kyang de'i tshe de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i tshul gyis rang dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa kho na yin gyi sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Obtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.

original: de lta bas na rigs pa 'dis chos mngon pa las 'byung ba kho na gzhung gzugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na rigs pa 'dis chos mngon pa las 'byung ba kho na gzhung gzugs par bya'o //
translated: Obtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩObtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.

original: de ltar tshig bye phrag tu ma phye na dge ba'i thob pa ma 'ongs pa rnams mu gnyis pa nyid du brjod par thal par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar tshig bye phrag tu ma phye na dge ba'i thob pa ma 'ongs pa rnams mu gnyis pa nyid du brjod par thal par 'gyur te /
translated: Obtainment of roots of virtue that are past and are homogeneous causes in one‚Äôs mindstream are that which generates the result that is similar to its cause in the present by the method of establishing it immediately after it.üîΩOb

original: de dag kyang de'i tshe 'das pa'i thob pa bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang de'i tshe 'das pa'i thob pa bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But don‚Äôt those also obtain those past states in the same way that they obtain present states?

original: de ni nyes pa med de ma 'ongs pa rnams la skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir la 'dir ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med de ma 'ongs pa rnams la skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir la 'dir ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i dbang du byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no error here, because future states do not have the same status as homogeneous causes, but this passage is from the perspective of homogeneous causes.

original: de ltar na yang thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ste zhes thob pa dag nyi tshe brjod par mi bya'i 'di skad du gang dag thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa ste zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ste zhes thob pa dag nyi tshe brjod par mi bya'i 'di skad du gang dag thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa ste zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Even so, it is not correct to say that those that are obtained first are those that are obtained, but it is correct to say that those that are obtained first are those that are obtained.

original: dge ba'i chos gang dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos gang dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: This means those virtuous phenomena.

original: dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba nas sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang dang po nyid du thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba nas sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang dang po nyid du thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: From the linking of virtuous minds and mental factors until the first moment of obtaining virtuous minds and mental factors,

original: de'i thob pa dag 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i thob pa dag 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: it is not that their obtainment alone is obtained.

original: de ni yin mod kyi 'on kyang dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba na thob pa rnams kho na gdon mi za ba'i phyir de skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni yin mod kyi 'on kyang dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba na thob pa rnams kho na gdon mi za ba'i phyir de skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: That is so, but when linking with virtue, it is definitely the obtainment of virtue that arises.üîΩObtainment of virtue definitely arises when linking with virtue through either correct view or doubt.

original: dge ba'i thob pa dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'am the tshom gyis kyang rung dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba na gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni the tshom gyis dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba na re zhig
analyzed: dge ba'i thob pa dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'am the tshom gyis kyang rung dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba na gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni the tshom gyis dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba na re zhig
translated: But mind and mental factors do not definitely arise when linking with virtue through doubt.

original: 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas thob pa dag kho na brjod pa yin no zhes rjod par byed do //
analyzed: 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas thob pa dag kho na brjod pa yin no zhes rjod par byed do //
translated: Therefore it is said that only obtainment is mentioned.üîΩNonvirtue is similar to that.

original: mi dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mi dge ba'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yang mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par byed pa ma yin pa yang yod @216b do zhes bya ba rgyas par mu
analyzed: mi dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mi dge ba'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yang mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par byed pa ma yin pa yang yod @216b do zhes bya ba rgyas par mu
translated: Nonvirtuous homogeneous causes that are results held but not projected exist.

original: bzhi par sbyar te /
analyzed: bzhi par sbyar te /
translated: This is applied to the fourth possibility.

original: mu dang po ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: mu dang po ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: The first possibility is the obtainment that is last to be relinquished by those who obtain freedom from attachment to the desire realm.

original: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: These nonvirtuous homogeneous causes are causes that maintain results but are not projecting causes.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di la nyon mongs pa yang rnam pa dgu yod pa la lam yang rnam pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: 'di la nyon mongs pa yang rnam pa dgu yod pa la lam yang rnam pa dgu yod do //
translated: Here there are nine types of affliction and there are nine types of path.üîΩThe small of the small path abandons the great of the great type of affliction and so on up to the great of the great path abandoning the small of the small type of affliction.

original: de la lam chung ngu'i chung ngus ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po spong bar 'gyur ba nas chen po'i chen pos ni chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong bar 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi thob pa dag kyang de dang 'dra ba kho nar spongüîΩbar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la lam chung ngu'i chung ngus ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po spong bar 'gyur ba nas chen po'i chen pos ni chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong bar 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi thob pa dag kyang de dang 'dra ba kho nar spongüîΩbar 'gyur ro //
translated: The obtainment of those afflictions is also abandoned in the same way.

original: des na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pa thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba mi dge ba chung ngu'i chung ngu'i thob pa gang dag yin pa mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed paüîΩdag yin gyi /
analyzed: des na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pa thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba mi dge ba chung ngu'i chung ngu'i thob pa gang dag yin pa mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa dag yin gyi /
translated: Therefore the obtainment of small of the small nonvirtuous karmic maturation that is relinquished last by all those who obtain freedom from attachment to the desire realm is a homogeneous cause of nonvirtuous karmic maturation that seizes its result.

original: mi dge ba'i thob pa'i skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i thob pa'i skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not a projecting cause because there is no other moment of the obtainment of nonvirtuous karmic maturation.üîΩThe second is the obtainment of nonvirtuous karmic maturation that is obtained first by all those who fully degenerate from freedom from attachment to the desire realm.

original: gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa thams cad kyi dang por mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ste mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed paüîΩyin gyi 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa thams cad kyi dang por mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa 'thob pa gang dag yin pa ste mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa yin gyi 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: That is a homogeneous cause of nonvirtuous karmic maturation that projects its result.

original: snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: But it is not a cause that seizes its result because it is like the former.

original: 'dir slob dpon 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba yin no zhes 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba yin no zhes 'chad par byed de /
translated: Here the Master explains that it should be said, ‚ÄúThey are lost by those very faculties.‚Äù

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dod pas gang dag yin pa de dag kho nas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dod pas gang dag yin pa de dag kho nas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Those who obtain freedom from attachment to the desire realm are those who are at the end of all stages of the desire realm.

original: de dag ni bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'byin par byed pa nyid yin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: de dag ni bzung zin pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'byin par byed pa nyid yin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: They are not faculties that apprehend objects because they have already been apprehended. They are only faculties that cause the arising of that object.

original: tshig snga ma la ni mu gnyis pa mi srid de ji skad sngar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig snga ma la ni mu gnyis pa mi srid de ji skad sngar bshad pa yin no //
translated: In the former statement, the second possibility is impossible, as explained earlier.

original: 'di la slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re de ni rung ba ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du phyir rgol bar byed de thams cad ni gong ma @217a * //
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re de ni rung ba ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du phyir rgol bar byed de thams cad ni gong ma @217a * //
translated: Here Master Sa·πÖghabhadra objects, ‚ÄúThat is not correct,‚Äù and he refutes it in the same way.

original: dang 'dra bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang 'dra bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: All should be applied as above.

original: gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs dang po dang gnyis pa ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs gnyis po de dag kho na ma gtogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams su'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs dang po dang gnyis pa ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs gnyis po de dag kho na ma gtogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams su'o //
translated: The third is in the remaining states that are not free from attachment to the desire realm.

original: dper na bdag cag gi mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa dag lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na bdag cag gi mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa dag lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the obtainment of nonvirtue.

original: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de dag ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: Those nonvirtuous homogeneous causes are both causes that maintain results and causes that project results.

original: bzhi pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: The fourth is those states not included in the aforementioned three types.

original: dper na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can gyi mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can gyi mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the obtainment of nonvirtue of one who is free of attachment to the desire realm and who does not degenerate.

original: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la de la de'i thob pa med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la de la de'i thob pa med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: That nonvirtuous homogeneous cause does not hold its result because it was previously obtained and it does not relinquish its result because the obtainment of that result does not exist.üîΩObscured neutral states are also like that.üîΩObscured neutral states also act in the same way as nonvirtuous states.üîΩObscured neutral homogeneous causes that hold their result but do not relinquish it are, for example, the obtainment of the first moment of absorption and uncontaminated states.

original: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba brgyas par 'byung ba ni lung du ma bstan pa yang de bzhin du bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par byed pa maüîΩyin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba rgyas par mu bzhi par bya ba yin te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa las ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba brgyas par 'byung ba ni lung du ma bstan pa yang de bzhin du bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par byed pa ma yin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba rgyas par mu bzhi par bya ba yin te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa las ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Obscured neutral homogeneous causes that relinquish their result but do not hold it are, for example, the obtainment of the first moment of absorption and uncontaminated states that is relinquished when one obtains the state of an arhat.üîΩObscured neutral homogeneous causes that hold their result and also relinquish it are, for example, the obtainment of the first moment of absorption and uncontaminated states that is relinquished when one degenerates from the state of an arhat.üîΩObscured neutral homogeneous causes that do not hold their result and also do not relinquish it are, for example, the obtainment of the first moment of absorption and uncontaminated states that is relinquished when one obtains the state of an arhat and the obtainment of the first moment of absorption and uncontaminated states that is relinquished when one degenerates from the state of an arhat.

original: mu dang po ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: mu dang po ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: The first possibility is the obtainment of all states that is relinquished at the end of the continuum.

original: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa can gyi skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa can gyi skad cig ma gzhan med pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That is, the obscured neutral homogeneous cause holds its effect, but it does not project its effect because there is no other afflicted moment.

original: gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The second is that which is obtained first by all arhats who fully degenerate.

original: 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no //
translated: It should be said that they fully degenerate by that alone.

original: de lta na 'bras bu 'byin pa gcig pu kho na yin par @217b bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na 'bras bu 'byin pa gcig pu kho na yin par @217b bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is taught that it is the sole projectory cause of its effect.

original: tshig snga ma la gzhung gzugs pa yang rim pa de nyid kyis brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig snga ma la gzhung gzugs pa yang rim pa de nyid kyis brjod par bya'o //
translated: The order of the terms should be stated in the same way as the treatise.

original: gsum pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i gnas skabs lhag ma dag tu'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i gnas skabs lhag ma dag tu'o //
translated: The third is in the remaining states of not being free from attachment to the summit of existence.

original: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: The fourth is that not included in those three.

original: dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: For example, the obtainment of the state of an arhat is an unobscured neutral homogeneous cause that is not a cause of similar status.

original: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni ci rigs par bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la spangs zin pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu de ni ci rigs par bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la spangs zin pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: That unobscured neutral homogeneous cause is not a cause that obtains its result because it is already obtained and it is not a cause that produces its result because it is already abandoned.üîΩUnobscured neutral states

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste zhes bya ba la /
translated: are connected to subsequent states.

original: tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin pas yang mi bshad do //
analyzed: tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin pas yang mi bshad do //
translated: The definition of connected to subsequent states has already been explained and will not be explained again.

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa 'byin par byed pa yang yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa 'byin par byed pa yang yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are there any unobscured neutral homogeneous causes that are causes that obtain their result and also causes that produce their result?

original: smras pa / re zhig 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa yang yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / re zhig 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa yang yin te /
translated: Those that produce their result are also causes that obtain their result.

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unobscured-neutral states are homogeneous causes of their own type up until nirvana.

original: 'dzin la mi 'byin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: 'dzin la mi 'byin pa yang yod de /
translated: There is that which is a homogeneous cause but not a productive cause.

original: dgra bcom pa'i phung po tha ma rnams te phung po thams cad nges par spangs pas ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i phung po tha ma rnams te phung po thams cad nges par spangs pas ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The final aggregates of an arhat are homogeneous causes because they are unobscured-neutral states, but they are not productive causes because all aggregates are definitely abandoned.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni skad cig re re la ste zhes bya ba ni sngar ni ci rigs par dmigs pa med pa rnams kyi nges par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni skad cig re re la ste zhes bya ba ni sngar ni ci rigs par dmigs pa med pa rnams kyi nges par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin terms of those that possess focal objects, it is in every moment‚Äù explains that in terms of those that possess focal objects, the homogeneous cause is in every moment.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid bshad do //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid bshad do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin terms of those that possess focal objects‚Äù explains that the homogeneous cause is in every moment in terms of minds and mental factors.

original: skad cig re re la ste zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma gzhan la ltos nas yin gyi yongs su gtugs te chad pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig re re la ste zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma gzhan la ltos nas yin gyi yongs su gtugs te chad pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin every moment‚Äù means in relation to other moments, but not in terms of a complete cessation.

original: dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su //üîΩzhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can nam lung du ma bstan pa'i @218a * //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can nam lung du ma bstan pa'i @218a * //
translated: Immediately after a virtuous mind,üîΩWhen one manifests a nonvirtuous or neutral mind immediately after a virtuous mind, at that time the virtuous mind seizes its result, either a virtuous future result that arises in its continuum without interruption or a result that is an unarisen state.

original: sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i sems de gang las de'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'bras bu dge ba ma 'ongs pa bar du chod par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am mi skye ba'i chos can gyi 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin no //üîΩ'byin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i sems de gang las de'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'bras bu dge ba ma 'ongs pa bar du chod par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am mi skye ba'i chos can gyi 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yin no // 'byin par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not project its result because a virtuous mind does not arise immediately after it.

original: 'di ltar de'i mjug thogs su dge ba 'byung ba med la skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni 'bras bu 'dra bas 'bras bu dang bcas par 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i mjug thogs su dge ba 'byung ba med la skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni 'bras bu 'dra bas 'bras bu dang bcas par 'dod do //
translated: A homogeneous cause possesses its result because it possesses a result that is similar to itself.

original: gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba'i sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i sems de sngon dge ba'i sems gang gis 'bras bu nyid
analyzed: gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba'i sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i sems de sngon dge ba'i sems gang gis 'bras bu nyid
translated: When a virtuous mind manifests immediately after a afflicted or a nonvirtuous mind, that virtuous mind is the active cause of any virtuous mind that was previously taken as an object.

original: du bzung ba de'i 'byin par byed pa yin gyi sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir de 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du bzung ba de'i 'byin par byed pa yin gyi sngon bzung zin pa'i phyir de 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the maintaining cause of that virtuous mind because it was previously maintained.

original: gsum pa ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar te /üîΩdge ba'i sems snga ma de ni dge ba'i sems gnyis pa 'bras bu nyid du 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gsum pa ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar te / dge ba'i sems snga ma de ni dge ba'i sems gnyis pa 'bras bu nyid du 'dzin par byed pa yang yin la /
translated: The third is virtuous immediately after a virtuous mind.üîΩThat previous virtuous mind is the maintaining cause of any second virtuous mind that is taken as an object.

original: de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: And it is the active cause of that second virtuous mind because it immediately establishes it.

original: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i
analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa de'i tshe dge ba'i
translated: When a virtuous mind arises immediately after a nonvirtuous mind, it does not obtain its result because it does not obtain a virtuous homogeneous cause that possesses focal objects.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'di bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la /üîΩnyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'di bzung zin pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin la / nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'i phyir 'byin par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It also does not project its result because it does not project a nonvirtuous homogeneous cause.üîΩThe same should be applied to nonvirtuous and so on.

original: mi dge ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par mi byed pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'bras bu 'dzin par byed la 'byin par mi byed pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o //
translated: There are four possibilities for a nonvirtuous homogeneous cause that possesses focal objects: It obtains its result but does not project it.

original: mu dang po ni mi dge ba'i mjug thogs su dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems @218b mngon du mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: mu dang po ni mi dge ba'i mjug thogs su dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems @218b mngon du mi byed pa'o //
translated: The first possibility is that a virtuous or indeterminate mind does not manifest immediately after a nonvirtuous mind.

original: gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o //
translated: The second is the opposite.

original: gsum pa ni mi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi dge ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni mi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi dge ba kho na'o //
translated: The third is that a nonvirtuous mind alone arises immediately after a nonvirtuous mind.

original: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o //
