analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang mi gsal ba'i phyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: A formless-realm unobscured neutral mind, since it arises from the actual basis of the formless realm when linking at death.üîΩA desire

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pas kyang ldang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pas kyang ldang ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is also not the case that one arises from the unobscured neutral state of the form realm.

original: 'di rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba'am /
translated: They do not link with those states

original: med pas 'di rnams ni de las mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: med pas 'di rnams ni de las mi 'byung ngo //
translated: because they do not exist there.

original: de drug gi zhes bya ba ni mjug thogs su zhes bya ba skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de drug gi zhes bya ba ni mjug thogs su zhes bya ba skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom those six‚Äù is connected to the phrase ‚Äúimmediately before.‚Äù

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the virtuous mind of the form realm‚Äù refers to the time of entering meditative attainment.

original: slob ba dang mi slob pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: slob ba dang mi slob pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the learner and nonlearner minds‚Äù refers to the time of rising from meditative attainment.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba la'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba la'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the virtuous mind of the form realm‚Äù refers to the time of being oppressed by afflicted meditative attainment.

original: bsgribs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: bsgribs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the obscured mind of the desire realm‚Äù refers to the time of linking.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni des sa 'og ma pa las 'dod @231a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni des sa 'og ma pa las 'dod @231a * //
translated: Except for afflicted states that are active in the desire realm and form realm, learners, and nonlearners.

original: chags dang ma bral ba dang nyid mtshams sbyor pa med pa'i phyir la slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las kyang ldang bar mi srid pa'i phyir de ni de dag las mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chags dang ma bral ba dang nyid mtshams sbyor pa med pa'i phyir la slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las kyang ldang bar mi srid pa'i phyir de ni de dag las mi 'byung ngo //
translated: It does not arise from those states because one who is not free from attachment to lower levels does not link with higher levels and it is impossible to rise from learner and nonlearner states.üîΩFour and nonlearner.

original: bzhi po de dag nyid dang mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe khams gsum pa'i dge ba dag dang rgyun gyi tshe slob pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su zad pa shes pa yin pas mi slob pa ste lnga'o //
analyzed: bzhi po de dag nyid dang mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe khams gsum pa'i dge ba dag dang rgyun gyi tshe slob pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su zad pa shes pa yin pas mi slob pa ste lnga'o //
translated: When rising from meditative attainment, it arises from the four virtuous minds of the three realms and when maintaining that state, it arises from learner mind and at the conclusion of the vajra like concentration, it arises from the knowledge of elimination. Therefore it arises from five.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de dag nyid las so zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe khams gsum pa'i dge ba rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de dag nyid las so zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe khams gsum pa'i dge ba rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
translated: When entering meditative attainment, the wholesome of the three realms arise. When arising from the vajra like concentration, the wholesome of the three realms arise.

original: de las sems ni bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni slob pa ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las sems ni bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni slob pa ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: Four minds arise from that.

original: mi slob pa las ni slob pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mi slob pa las ni slob pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The learner mind does not arise from the nonlearner mind.

original: yongs su nyams pa'i tshe ji ltar mi 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa'i tshe ji ltar mi 'byung zhe na /
translated: How does it not arise from the nonlearner mind when one regresses?

original: nyon mongs pa 'byung bas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩskyes nas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba la skyes nas thob pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag tu srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gang gis thob pa dang po nyid du skye ba'i yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'byung bas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro // skyes nas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba la skyes nas thob pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag tu srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gang gis thob pa dang po nyid du skye ba'i yin no //
translated: Because the arising of affliction interrupts.üîΩObtained from birth and arisen from preparation.üîΩObtained from birth is that obtained by the first birth in the desire realm and form realm when linking at death through the intermediate existence.üîΩIn the formless realm, it is that obtained by the first birth when linking at death.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su ni skye ba'i srid pa'i tshe gang gis thob pa skye ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su ni skye ba'i srid pa'i tshe gang gis thob pa skye ba yin no //
translated: Arisen from preparation is that obtained by the first birth in the desire realm and form realm when linking at death through the intermediate existence.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba ni gang zhig sbyor bas 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba ni gang zhig sbyor bas 'thob pa ste /
translated: That arisen from preparation is obtained by preparation.

original: khams gsum dag tu thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: khams gsum dag tu thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: It is any of those arisen from hearing, contemplation, or meditation in the three realms.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang sprul pa'i sems zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rgyu dang las kyi bye brag gis tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang sprul pa'i sems zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rgyu dang las kyi bye brag gis tha dad pa yin te /
translated: The mind governing demeanor, the mind of creativity, and the mind of emanation are differentiated by cause and action.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: The mind arisen from the cause of karmic maturation is arisen from karmic maturation.

original: spyod lam nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dag las 'byung ba ni spyod lam pa yin no //
analyzed: spyod lam nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dag las 'byung ba ni spyod lam pa yin no //
translated: The mind governing demeanor arises from the demeanor of lying down, sitting, standing, or walking.

original: bzo'i gnas dag la 'byung ba ni bzo'i gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: bzo'i gnas dag la 'byung ba ni bzo'i gnas pa yin no //
translated: The mind of creativity arises from creative works.

original: sprul pa'i phyir sems pa ni sprul pa'i sems so //
analyzed: sprul pa'i phyir sems pa ni sprul pa'i sems so //
translated: The mind of emanation is the mind that emanates.

original: yang na sprul pa'am sprul par bya ba la 'byung bas na sprul pa pa de de nyid la bya'o //
analyzed: yang na sprul pa'am sprul par bya ba la 'byung bas na sprul pa pa de de nyid la bya'o //
translated: Or it is the mind that arises from emanation or that which is emanated.

original: nyi shur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar zhe na dge ba drug dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa bdun du phye nas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: nyi shur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar zhe na dge ba drug dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa bdun du phye nas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Six types of virtue and seven unobscured neutral states are distinguished.üîΩIn the three realms, virtue is distinguished into six types: that obtained from birth and that derived from preparation.

original: khams gsum dag tu sbyor ba las byung ba dang / skyes nas @231b thob pa'i ngo bor dge ba rnam pa drug tu phye ba dang 'dod pa'i khams su rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang /
analyzed: khams gsum dag tu sbyor ba las byung ba dang / skyes nas @231b thob pa'i ngo bor dge ba rnam pa drug tu phye ba dang 'dod pa'i khams su rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang /
translated: In the desire realm, virtue is distinguished into four types: that obtained from birth, that derived from preparation, that arisen from the karmic maturation of past action and that of deportment.üîΩIn the form realm, virtue is distinguished into three types: that obtained from birth, that derived from preparation and that of emanation.

original: sprul pa'i bye brag dang / gzugs kyi khams su rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang sprul pa'i bye brag gis 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gnyis kyis ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag rnam pa bdun du phye nas te /
analyzed: sprul pa'i bye brag dang / gzugs kyi khams su rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang sprul pa'i bye brag gis 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gnyis kyis ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag rnam pa bdun du phye nas te /
translated: In the desire and form realms, unobscured neutral states are distinguished into seven types: that arisen from the karmic maturation of past action, that of deportment, that of craftsmanship, that of emanation, that obtained from birth, that derived from preparation and that of emanation.

original: bcu gsum po de dag dang lhag ma ma phye ba bdun kho na ste /
analyzed: bcu gsum po de dag dang lhag ma ma phye ba bdun kho na ste /
translated: These are the thirteen.

original: 'di lta ste 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
translated: Thus there are twenty minds: nonvirtuous minds and obscured neutral minds in the desire realm, obscured neutral minds in the form realm,

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa ste de ltar sems nyi shur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa ste de ltar sems nyi shur 'gyur ro //
translated: unobscured neutral minds and learner and nonlearner minds in the formless realm.

original: spyod lam la sogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams na spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang sprul pa med pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag med de /
analyzed: spyod lam la sogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams na spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang sprul pa med pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag med de /
translated: Because there is no posture and so on means that these three minds do not exist in the formless realm because there is no posture, no creative arts and no emanation.

original: dmigs par gyur pa'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs par gyur pa'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no form that is their focal object.

original: de dag gi dmigs pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams yin no zhes bya ba de la spyod lam pa'i dmigs pa ni mal cha dang stan gyi gzugs la sogs pa dang rang gi lus kyi yan lag gi gzugs la sogs pa yin no
analyzed: de dag gi dmigs pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams yin no zhes bya ba de la spyod lam pa'i dmigs pa ni mal cha dang stan gyi gzugs la sogs pa dang rang gi lus kyi yan lag gi gzugs la sogs pa yin no
translated: The object of the practitioner is form, etc. of bedding and seats, and form, etc. of one‚Äôs own body.

original: // bzo'i gnas pa ni bzo'i gnas kyi gzugs la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: // bzo'i gnas pa ni bzo'i gnas kyi gzugs la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The object of the artisan is form, etc. of the craft.

original: sprul pa pa'i ni sprul pa'i gzugs la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sprul pa pa'i ni sprul pa'i gzugs la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The object of the emanator is form, etc. of the emanation.

original: bzo'i gnas pa ni sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bzo'i gnas pa ni sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The artisan also has sound as an object.

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used to indicate a distinction.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzugs la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzugs la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes form, etc.

original: 'di'i dmigs pa ni sgra yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i dmigs pa ni sgra yang yin te /
translated: Sound is also an object of the artisan.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pas bzo'i lung gi sgra la dmigs nas bzo slob pas so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas bzo'i lung gi sgra la dmigs nas bzo slob pas so //
translated: The artisan learns the craft by observing the sound of the master‚Äôs oral instruction with mental consciousness.

original: rnam par smin pa'i dmigs pa ni ma smos pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyang yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i dmigs pa ni ma smos pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa thams cad kyang yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Also, since the object of karmic maturation is not mentioned, you should understand that it is all objects such as form and so on.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni spyod lam pa la sogs pa gsum ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni spyod lam pa la sogs pa gsum ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na yin te /
translated: The three such as the mind governing demeanor are mental consciousness alone because they arise from the motivating

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mngon par @232a * //üîΩ'du byed pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i mngon par @232a * // 'du byed pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: force of conception.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma smos pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa drug car gyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma smos pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa drug car gyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the object of karmic maturation is not mentioned, it is taught that it is the nature of the six consciousnesses.

original: spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dag gi sbyor ba pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga yin no zhes bya ba de la sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na yod pa'i phyir sbyor ba pa dag ste /
analyzed: spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dag gi sbyor ba pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga yin no zhes bya ba de la sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na yod pa'i phyir sbyor ba pa dag ste /
translated: The preparation of the three such as the mind governing demeanor is the five collections of consciousness because they exist at the time of preparation.

original: 'di ltar de dag ni mthong ba dang reg pa'i bar las skye'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni mthong ba dang reg pa'i bar las skye'o //
translated: Thus they arise from seeing and so on up to touch.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la ni sbyor ba med de /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la ni sbyor ba med de /
translated: But those born from karmic maturation do not have preparation.üîΩ

original: las kyi mthus rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las kyi mthus rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That arisen from karmic maturation does not arise from preparation because it arises by the power of karma.üîΩThat established by the mental consciousness of the creative stateüîΩis neutral and focuses on the twelve sense bases.

original: bzo'i gnas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzhan dag na re bzo'i gnas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas mngon par bsgrubs shing bskyed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis la dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: bzo'i gnas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzhan dag na re bzo'i gnas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas mngon par bsgrubs shing bskyed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis la dmigs pa ste /
translated: Others say: The mental consciousness established and generated by the mental consciousness of the creative state focuses on the twelve sense bases.

original: mig gi skye mched la dmigs pa nas chos kyi skye mched kyi bar la dmigs pa la lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyang yod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: mig gi skye mched la dmigs pa nas chos kyi skye mched kyi bar la dmigs pa la lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyang yod do zhes zer ro //
translated: It is neutral and also focuses on the eye sense base up to the phenomena sense base.

original: de ltar na spyod lam pa la sogs pa'i nang du ma gtogs pa gang yin pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa gzhan yang yod do zhes rab tu ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na spyod lam pa la sogs pa'i nang du ma gtogs pa gang yin pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa gzhan yang yod do zhes rab tu ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: Thus they teach that there is another unobscured neutral state not included among the categories of the mind of the sense sphere such as the mind governing demeanor and so on.

original: de kho na ltar yid par yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na ltar yid par yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in just the same way.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang / rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong //
analyzed: gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang / rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong //
translated: In the second absorption and above, the body, eye, and ear consciousnesses, and the mental consciousness that activates them,

original: gang yin de ni dang por rtogs //
analyzed: gang yin de ni dang por rtogs //
translated: are known as the first investigation.

original: de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min //
analyzed: de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min //
translated: They are neutral and not afflictions.

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: rang gi sa pas sprul par byed //
analyzed: rang gi sa pas sprul par byed //
translated: Emanations are of one‚Äôs own level.

original: 'og ma yis ni smrar 'jug go //
analyzed: 'og ma yis ni smrar 'jug go //
translated: Those of lower level speak.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa de dag bzhi po 'di dag gang gis bsdus /üîΩre zhig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa de dag bzhi po 'di dag gang gis bsdus / re zhig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag ni ma yin te /
translated: Which of these four consciousnesses are included in the four types of consciousness that will be explained?

original: gong mar skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo nyid sa 'og ma pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩspyod lam pa la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gong mar skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo nyid sa 'og ma pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // spyod lam pa la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: First, they are not consciousness arisen from karmic maturation because the nature of karmic maturation of those born in higher levels is not of lower levels.

original: spyod lam pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyod lam pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are also not the four types of consciousness such as those of deportment because those of higher levels do not have consciousness of deportment and so on.

original: mi shes pa la sogs pa'i bag chags can gyi sems yin par yang mi gzhug go //
analyzed: mi shes pa la sogs pa'i bag chags can gyi sems yin par yang mi gzhug go //
translated: They are not the mind that possesses the latent states of ignorance and so on.

original: 'di ni btsun pa go cha mtha' yas kyis kyang rnam par bshad pa'i bshad pa las /
analyzed: 'di ni btsun pa go cha mtha' yas kyis kyang rnam par bshad pa'i bshad pa las /
translated: This is also explained by Bhadanta Anantavarman in his commentary on the Abhidharmako≈õa:

original: bzhi po dag las ma gtogs par rnam par shes pa lung du ma @232b bstan pa gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes bshad de /
analyzed: bzhi po dag las ma gtogs par rnam par shes pa lung du ma @232b bstan pa gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes bshad de /
translated: ‚ÄúApart from the four, there is also neutral consciousness.‚Äù

original: bshad pa 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: This explanation should be understood as incomplete.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs kho nar 'byung gi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs su ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs kho nar 'byung gi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs su ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúExcept for the result of superknowledge‚Äù means that a desire realm mind occurs immediately after a form realm mind that is derived from preparation, but not immediately after a desire realm mind derived from preparation.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'i'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúA form realm mind derived from preparation, a learner mind, and an adept mind‚Äù refers to the mind at the time of entering meditative attainment.

original: rang gi dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni rang gi dge ba dang nyan mangs pa can dag ste /
analyzed: rang gi dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni rang gi dge ba dang nyan mangs pa can dag ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIts own virtuous and afflicted minds‚Äù means its own virtuous and afflicted minds.

original: sbyor ba'i tshe ni nyon mongs pa can med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i tshe ni nyon mongs pa can med pa'i phyir la /
translated: At the time of preparation, it is not from afflicted because there is none.

original: nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba la ni sbyor ba las byung ba skye ba'i phyir ro //üîΩma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba la ni sbyor ba las byung ba skye ba'i phyir ro // ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag las ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is from the obscured because one is wearied by affliction.

original: stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not from the unobscured because it is weak and not a motivatingüîΩfactor.üîΩFrom form realm states that are derived from preparation and affliction,

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba la sogs pa dag ni sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dag las ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba la sogs pa dag ni sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dag las ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
translated: at the time of rising from meditative attainment, it is from the learner andüîΩnonlearner.

original: nyon mongs pa can las ni nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba la'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can las ni nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba la'o //
translated: From the afflicted, it is from the afflicted when one is oppressed by afflicted concentration.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe skyes nas thob pa'i sems la ni 'chi ba srid do //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe skyes nas thob pa'i sems la ni 'chi ba srid do //
translated: From form realm and formless realm states that are afflicted, at the time of linking, it is from the mind obtained from birth.

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: As before means except for the result of the higher perceptions.

original: de ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs kho nar 'byung bar bshad do //
analyzed: de ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i mjug thogs kho nar 'byung bar bshad do //
translated: It is explained that it arises immediately after the form realm derived from preparation alone.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can las zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can las zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The form realm derived from preparation and afflicted states means derived from preparation and afflicted states.

original: rgyas par snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyas par snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained in detail as before.

original: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i mjug thogs dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su zhes brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i mjug thogs dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su zhes brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Immediately after nonvirtuous and obscured neutral states means immediately after nonvirtuous and immediately after obscured neutral states.

original: de dag ni 'dra ba'i phyir cig car du bshad do //üîΩsbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa la /
analyzed: de dag ni 'dra ba'i phyir cig car du bshad do // sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa la /
translated: They are explained together because they are similar.üîΩAbiding in the result of the higher perceptions derived from preparation
and the uncontaminated state

original: ba med pas de'i phyir de dag las nyon mongs pa can de gnyis mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba med pas de'i phyir de dag las nyon mongs pa can de gnyis mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, these two afflicted states do not arise from those two.

original: lhag ma la gnas pa la ni 'che ba yod de /
analyzed: lhag ma la gnas pa la ni 'che ba yod de /
translated: But when one is still in the remaining stages, there is a possibility of retrogressing.

original: de'i phyir nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe de rnams las nyon mongs pa can de gnyis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe de rnams las nyon mongs pa can de gnyis 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, when one is linking up with a rebirth, these two afflicted states arise from those two.

analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra bar bshad par bya'o //

translated: The phrase ‚Äúsix arise from the divine eye and ear‚Äù refers to the time when one is abiding in those meditative states.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúsix arise from the divine eye and ear‚Äù refers to the time

original: 'dod pa spyod pa'i dge ba dag ces bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe ste gsal ba'i phyir skyes nas thob pas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba srid pa yod pas de'i phyir dge ba gnyis ka yang smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa spyod pa'i dge ba dag ces bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe ste gsal ba'i phyir skyes nas thob pas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba srid pa yod pas de'i phyir dge ba gnyis ka yang smos pa yin no //
translated: Virtue of the realm of desire is that of the stage of meditative development, because it is clear. Since it is possible to arise from meditative attainment through virtue obtained from birth, both kinds of virtue are mentioned.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems so //
translated: The result of the supernormal powers is the mind of emanation of the realm of desire.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
translated: The formless realm is the mind of meditative development, the learner, and the nonlearner, when entering meditative attainment.

original: spyod lam pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyod lam pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Except for the mind of deportment and the mind that is the result of ripening, because they are weak and not the result of accumulation.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa @233b can dag ces bya ba ni ldang ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'dug pas gzir ba'i tshe dag na'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa @233b can dag ces bya ba ni ldang ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'dug pas gzir ba'i tshe dag na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from preparation and afflicted‚Äù means when one is oppressed by rising from meditative attainment and afflicted meditative attainment.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAfflicted of the desire realm‚Äù means at the time of linking.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sems ni sbyor ba pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sems ni sbyor ba pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúExcept for the result of higher perception‚Äù means because the mind of emanation arises immediately after the mind of preparation.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAfflicted of the formless realm‚Äù means at the time of linking.

original: dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can bzhi zhes bya ba ni dge ba dag dang nyon mongs pa can dag ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can rnams so zhes bya bar tshig bsdu ste /
analyzed: dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can bzhi zhes bya ba ni dge ba dag dang nyon mongs pa can dag ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can rnams so zhes bya bar tshig bsdu ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe four virtuous and afflicted‚Äù means that virtuous and afflicted are subsumed in the words virtuous and afflicted.

original: dge ba dag ni sa 'og ma pa'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge ba dag ni sa 'og ma pa'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because virtuous minds depend on virtuous minds of lower level.

original: mi dge ba dag ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba dag ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: Nonvirtuous ones at the time of linking.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de rnams las nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de rnams las nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: Those that are desire realm objects are desire realm objects at the time of linking.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag las gnas pa la ni 'chi ba med pas de rnams las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag las gnas pa la ni 'chi ba med pas de rnams las ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not at the time of maintaining those that arise from preparation, those that are the basis of craftsmanship, or those that are the result of higher perception, because death is impossible at those times.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ste /
translated: Those that are desire realm objects are desire realm objects at the time of linking.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can yang 'di nyid kyi tshe na'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can yang 'di nyid kyi tshe na'o //
translated: Those that are formless realm objects are formless realm objects at that time.

original: rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba yang 'di las mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba yang 'di las mi 'byung ste /
translated: Those that arise from one‚Äôs own preparation do not arise from this.

original: spyod lam pa ni stobs chung ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa nyid kyis sbyor ba yin par mi 'os pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyod lam pa ni stobs chung ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa can ma yin pa nyid kyis sbyor ba yin par mi 'os pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the desire realm object that is the basis of craftsmanship is not suitable to be preparation because it is weak and does not strongly motivate one.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyod lam bshad pa ji lta bar 'di yang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyod lam bshad pa ji lta bar 'di yang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Just as the explanation of the four types of conduct was given, so too should this be explained.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te zhes bya ba nas mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar tshig gi don de dag kho na yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te zhes bya ba nas mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar tshig gi don de dag kho na yin no //
translated: Immediately after those born from the cause of karmic maturation, seven arise, up to those except for the result of higher perception.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu mjug thogs su ni gnyis te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu mjug thogs su ni gnyis te /
translated: Immediately after the result of higher perception, two arise:

original: rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag kho na'i zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag kho na'i zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
translated: those arisen from the cause of preparation and the result of higher perception themselves, at the time of arising and the time of the continuum.

original: de yang de dag kho na las so zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i tshe dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: de yang de dag kho na las so zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i tshe dang rgyun gyi tshe'o //
translated: And those arise from those two, at the time of entering and the time of the continuum.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe na ste /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe na ste /
translated: Those arisen from the cause of preparation in the form realm arise from those two, at the time of arising and the time of the continuum.

original: slob pa dang mi slob @234a * //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob @234a * //
translated: Those of learners and nonlearners.

original: pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same applies to the formless realm.üîΩThe wholesome of its own level arises from four.üîΩThe defiled arises from the wholesome and the defiled.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined.

original: rang gi bzhi zhes bya ba la dge ba ni 'byung ngo zhes bya bar gsal lo //üîΩnyon mongs pa can ni ro myang ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: rang gi bzhi zhes bya ba la dge ba ni 'byung ngo zhes bya bar gsal lo // nyon mongs pa can ni ro myang ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The wholesome arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined.üîΩThe defiled arises from the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined.üîΩThe wholesome of the realm of desire arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.üîΩThe defiled arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
translated: The wholesome of the realm of fine-materiality arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The defiled arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
translated: The wholesome of the realm of immateriality arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of immateriality.üîΩThe defiled arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of immateriality.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of immateriality.üîΩThe wholesome of the realm of desire arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.üîΩThe defiled arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined arises from the wholesome, the defiled and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of desire.

original: sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dag go //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dag go //
translated: The wholesome of the realm of fine-materiality arises from the wholesome and the unobscured-non-defined of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba la sbyor ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba la sbyor ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose that arise from meditative development and those that are morally afflicted in the form realm‚Äù refers to the fact that the form realm is dominated by the morally afflicted meditative concentration that arises from meditative development.

original: nyon mongs pa can ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose that are morally afflicted‚Äù refers to the state of rebirth.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag kyang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag kyang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose that are morally afflicted in the realm of desire‚Äù refers to the state of rebirth.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sems de rnams la gnas pa la 'chi ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sems de rnams la gnas pa la 'chi ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose that are found in the realm of desire and the form realm‚Äù refers to the fact that death is possible for those who abide in those states of consciousness.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwith the exception of those that arise from meditative development‚Äù is used because a state of consciousness that arises from the ripening of karma is not immediately followed by a state of consciousness that arises from meditative development.

original: 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can gsum po zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe khams gnyis po dag go //
analyzed: 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can gsum po zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe khams gnyis po dag go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe three morally afflicted states of consciousness of the lower realm‚Äù refers to the two realms of form and the formless.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gsal ba'i phyir slob pa las ldang ba'i sems yin pa srid de gsal ba'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gsal ba'i phyir slob pa las ldang ba'i sems yin pa srid de gsal ba'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúobtaining a birth in the desire realm‚Äù is used because it is possible that this is a clear mind that arises from training. The reason is because it is clear.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dag ni de ltar gsal ba ma yin pas de dag ni mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dag ni de ltar gsal ba ma yin pas de dag ni mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The minds obtained from birth in the form and formless realms are not like that, so they do not occur.

original: slob pa ni rgyun gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: slob pa ni rgyun gyi tshe'o //
translated: A mind of training occurs in the continuum.

original: mi slob pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su'o //
translated: A mind of no training occurs immediately after the vajra like concentration.

original: slob pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa las slob pa mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: slob pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa las slob pa mi 'byung ste /
translated: Except for the single mind of training, a mind of training does not occur immediately after a mind of no training.

original: de lta bas na mi slob pa'i mjug thogs su lnga yin gyi drug ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na mi slob pa'i mjug thogs su lnga yin gyi drug ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, five minds occur immediately after a mind of no training, not six.

original: slob pa las ji lta ba bzhin te /
analyzed: slob pa las ji lta ba bzhin te /
translated: The same is true of a mind of training.

original: de dag ni slob pa bzhin du lnga @234b yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni slob pa bzhin du lnga @234b yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Five minds should be stated as occurring immediately after a mind of training, just as they do after a mind of no training.

original: 'dir sems nyi shu'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen mdor ma byas pa'i mdo lta bu'i bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag ni /
analyzed: 'dir sems nyi shu'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen mdor ma byas pa'i mdo lta bu'i bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag ni /
translated: Here, the Abhidharmako≈õa does not summarize the twenty minds that are equivalent immediately preceding conditions, as it does for the s≈´tras.

original: 'dod dge sbyor byung ba las bcu gcig //
analyzed: 'dod dge sbyor byung ba las bcu gcig //
translated: Eleven arise from the virtue of the desire realm arisen from preparation.üîΩEight arise from that.

original: de brgyad las dge gzhan las ni //
analyzed: de brgyad las dge gzhan las ni //
translated: Nine arise from other virtue.

original: dgu ste de ni bcu gcig las //
analyzed: dgu ste de ni bcu gcig las //
translated: That arises from eleven.

original: nyon mongs pa can las bdun te //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can las bdun te //
translated: Seven arise from afflicted states.

original: de dag so sor bcu bzhi las /üîΩspyod lam rnam smin skyes las brgyad //
analyzed: de dag so sor bcu bzhi las / spyod lam rnam smin skyes las brgyad //
translated: Each arises from fourteen.

original: de dag bdun las bzo'i gnas las //
analyzed: de dag bdun las bzo'i gnas las //
translated: Eight arise from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from preparation and from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from karmic maturation.

original: drug ste de ni bdun las so //
analyzed: drug ste de ni bdun las so //
translated: Seven arise from that.üîΩSix arise from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from karmic maturation and from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from karmic maturation.üîΩTwo arise from emanation.

original: sprul pa las gnyis de gnyis las //
analyzed: sprul pa las gnyis de gnyis las //
translated: Two arise from that.

original: gzugs na sbyor byung dge ba las /
analyzed: gzugs na sbyor byung dge ba las /
translated: In the form realm, twelve arise from the virtue arisen from preparation.

original: bcu gnyis de ni bcu las so //
analyzed: bcu gnyis de ni bcu las so //
translated: That arises from ten.

original: ma 'bad byung dge las brgyad de //
analyzed: ma 'bad byung dge las brgyad de //
translated: Eight arise from the virtue arisen from natural outflow.

original: lnga las nyon mongs can la dgu //
analyzed: lnga las nyon mongs can la dgu //
translated: Nine arise from afflicted states.

original: de ni bcu gcig las yin te //
analyzed: de ni bcu gcig las yin te //
translated: That arises from eleven.

original: spyod lam rnam smin skyes las bdun //
analyzed: spyod lam rnam smin skyes las bdun //
translated: Seven arise from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from karmic maturation and from the virtue of the absorptions and formless realm arisen from karmic maturation.

original: gnyis po de ni lnga las so //
analyzed: gnyis po de ni lnga las so //
translated: Two arise from that.

original: mngon shes 'bras las sems gnyis te //
analyzed: mngon shes 'bras las sems gnyis te //
translated: Two minds arise from the result of higher perception.

original: de bzhin de ni gnyis nyid las //
analyzed: de bzhin de ni gnyis nyid las //
translated: So too, it arises from two.

original: gzugs med 'bad byung dge las bdun //
analyzed: gzugs med 'bad byung dge las bdun //
translated: From the wholesome of the formless realm, seven arise.

original: de ni drug po kho na las //
analyzed: de ni drug po kho na las //
translated: It arises from six.

original: ma 'bad byung ba'i dge las bdun //
analyzed: ma 'bad byung ba'i dge las bdun //
translated: From the wholesome not acquired by effort, seven arise.

original: de bzhin las gzhan brgyad pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin las gzhan brgyad pa ni //
translated: So too, from the other, the eighth.

original: nyon mongs can las de bcu las //
analyzed: nyon mongs can las de bcu las //
translated: From the afflicted, it arises from ten.

original: rnam smin skyes las rnam drug ste //
analyzed: rnam smin skyes las rnam drug ste //
translated: From the arisen from fruition, six.

original: bzhi las slob pa las drug go //
analyzed: bzhi las slob pa las drug go //
translated: From the four, from the learner, six.

original: de ni bzhi po kho na las //
analyzed: de ni bzhi po kho na las //
translated: It arises from the four.

original: mi slob pa la lnga de yang /
analyzed: mi slob pa la lnga de yang /
translated: From the nonlearner, five.

original: lnga po dag gi mjug thogs su //üîΩspyod lam dang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag las sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //üîΩ'dir ci rigs par spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: lnga po dag gi mjug thogs su // spyod lam dang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag las sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro // 'dir ci rigs par spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ste /
translated: It arises from the five.üîΩBecause it is engaged in deportment and in the creation of crafts, the arisen from preparation does not arise from those.

original: de dag ni gzhan mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: In this context, the arisen from preparation does not arise from the minds of deportment and the creation of crafts because they are engaged in other manifest actions.

original: 'di ltar spyod lam pa ni spyod lam mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar spyod lam pa ni spyod lam mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the mind governing demeanor is engaged in the activity of governing demeanor.

original: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is of the aspect of going and so on.

original: bzo'i gnas pa yang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa yin te /
analyzed: bzo'i gnas pa yang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa yin te /
translated: The mind governing creativity is engaged in the activity of creating.

original: 'di kho na bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can du zhugs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩstobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ba @235a * //üîΩyin te / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir stobs chung ba yang yin la /
analyzed: 'di kho na bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can du zhugs pa'i phyir ro // stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ba @235a * // yin te / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir stobs chung ba yang yin la /
translated: It is engaged in the aspect of thinking, I will do this.üîΩBecause it is weak and engages without exertion.üîΩA mind derived from karmic maturation does not arise immediately after a mind derived from preparation because

original: sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i phyir dang / 'bad pa med par 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa yang yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i phyir dang / 'bad pa med par 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa yang yin no //
translated: that derived from karmic maturation is weak because it is neutral and it engages without exertion because it arises through the projection of past karma.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na spyod lam dang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na spyod lam dang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo //
translated: In one sense, preparatory states do not arise from the immediately preceding condition of the first two access concentrations and the last two actual bases because they are engaged in the activity of posture and the activity of art.

original: stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir spyod lam pa dang bzo'i nas pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir spyod lam pa dang bzo'i nas pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ste /
translated: In another sense, preparatory states do not arise from the immediately preceding condition of the first two access concentrations and the last two actual bases because they are weak and they engage their object without exertion.

original: thams cad kyi lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyis stobs chung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩmngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir ni rnam par smin pas skyes pa gcig kho na'i mjug thogs su mi 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyis stobs chung ba'i phyir ro // mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir ni rnam par smin pas skyes pa gcig kho na'i mjug thogs su mi 'byung ba yin no //
translated: They are weak because they are neutral in all cases.üîΩThey do not arise from the immediately preceding condition of the first two access concentrations and the last two actual bases because they engage their object without exertion.

original: yang na spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dag la yang sbyor ba las byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yang na spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dag la yang sbyor ba las byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: In another sense, preparatory states do not arise from the immediately preceding condition of the first two access concentrations and the last two actual bases because they are not engaged through exertion.

original: de gnyis ni gzhan la byed par zad pa nyid tsam gyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa nyid ces bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis ni gzhan la byed par zad pa nyid tsam gyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa nyid ces bshad pa yin no //
translated: Because those two are merely exhausted in relation to others, they are called ‚Äúengaged in manifest compositional activity.‚Äù

original: des na tshig 'di'i sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na tshig 'di'i sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: The application of this term is as follows:

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa de dag ni spyod lam dang / bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir dang / stobs chung ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa de dag ni spyod lam dang / bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir dang / stobs chung ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: Since those born from karmic maturation, those of deportment, and those of creative activity are engaged in the manifest compositional activity of deportment and creative activity, they are not compatible with that arisen from preparation because they are weak and they engage without manifest compositional activity.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyi mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyi mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ba yin no //
translated: Therefore the application is that that arisen from preparation does not arise after them.

original: 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pas zhes bya ba la sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi rgyun las gzhan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni 'byung ba'i sems yin la /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pas zhes bya ba la sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi rgyun las gzhan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni 'byung ba'i sems yin la /
translated: Any mind other than the continuum of mind derived from practice is the arising mind.

original: des ni rnal 'byor ba 'di rgyu de las 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: des ni rnal 'byor ba 'di rgyu de las 'byung bar byed do //
translated: This yogi arises from that cause.

original: de'i mjug yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mjug yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the conclusion of that.

original: 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug cing lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug cing lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas /
translated: The arising mind is engaged without exertion, engaged spontaneously.

original: 'byung ba'i sems rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid de ni @235b sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su 'byung bar rigs so //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sems rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid de ni @235b sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su 'byung bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, the arising mind, which is any of the natures such as arisen from karmic maturation and so on, is suitable to arise immediately after the mind derived from practice.

original: de lta na'o na ni zhes bya ba ni gal te sbyor ba las byung ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung na /
analyzed: de lta na'o na ni zhes bya ba ni gal te sbyor ba las byung ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas rnam par smin pa las skyes pa la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su sbyor ba las byung ba mi 'byung na /
translated: If that is so, then since it is not compatible with that arisen from preparation, that arisen from preparation would not arise after that arisen from karmic maturation, etc.

original: de lta na 'o na ni nyon mongs pa can dag las kyang sbyor ba las byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni nyon mongs pa can dag las kyang sbyor ba las byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that is so, then that arisen from preparation would not arise from afflicted states, because they are incompatible.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi chos ni mi mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi chos ni mi mthun pa yin te /
translated: Afflicted phenomena are incompatible.

original: de dang 'gal ba'i phyir dge ba dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba'i phyir dge ba dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: They are not compatible with virtue because they are contradictory.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de dang mi mthun mod kyis /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de dang mi mthun mod kyis /
translated: Still, even though they are incompatible,

original: 'on kyang nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung bas yongs su skyo ba'i rnal 'byor ba la ni de yongs su shes pa las te /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung bas yongs su skyo ba'i rnal 'byor ba la ni de yongs su shes pa las te /
translated: that arisen from preparation arises from afflicted states, because the yogi who is completely wearied by the occurrence of affliction fully understands that.

original: nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba yongs su shes pa las sbyor ba las byung ba mngon du 'gyur bar rigs te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba yongs su shes pa las sbyor ba las byung ba mngon du 'gyur bar rigs te /
translated: It is proper that the mind of entry into the first meditative stabilization arises from the complete knowledge of the occurrence of the passions,

original: de yongs su shes pa nyid sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems yin pas so //
analyzed: de yongs su shes pa nyid sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems yin pas so //
translated: because the complete knowledge of the passions is the mind of entry into the first meditative stabilization.

original: gsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa ni gsal ba yin pas de ni slob pa la sogs pa las ldang ba'i sems yin pa srid do //
analyzed: gsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa ni gsal ba yin pas de ni slob pa la sogs pa las ldang ba'i sems yin pa srid do //
translated: Because it is clear means that the mind obtained from birth in the desire realm is clear, so it is possible that it is the mind of entry into the learner and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba yang de la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba yang de la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even one oppressed by afflicted concentration will rely on it.

original: de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i phyir de las ni slob pa la sogs pa de dag mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i phyir de las ni slob pa la sogs pa de dag mi 'byung ngo //
translated: But because that mind obtained from birth in the desire realm arises without exertion, those minds of learner and so on do not arise from it.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa bzhin du gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa bzhin du gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: The mind obtained from birth in the form realm is not clear like that obtained from birth in the desire realm.

original: de lta bas na nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba de la brten par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na nyon mongs pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir ba de la brten par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, one does not rely on the meditative development of the afflicted view of self, etc.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba kho na rten par byed do //üîΩsems rnams phan tshun gyi mjug thogs su 'byung la de dag kyang yid la byed pa'i dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir yid la byed pa ni gsum ste zhes bya ba rgyas par yid la byed pa nye bar 'god pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba kho na rten par byed do // sems rnams phan tshun gyi mjug thogs su 'byung la de dag kyang yid la byed pa'i dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir yid la byed pa ni gsum ste zhes bya ba rgyas par yid la byed pa nye bar 'god pa yin no //
translated: because they are overwhelmed by afflicted meditative concentration.üîΩThe mind arises in immediate succession to other minds and they arise through the power of mental attention.üîΩTherefore, mental attention is threefold.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ste /
translated: Mental attention to the specific and general characteristics of the aggregates, elements and spheres is mental attention to the specific and general characteristics.

original: dper na gzugs ni gnod par byar rung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin no snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na gzugs ni gnod par byar rung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin no snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúform is characterized by obstruction‚Äù and so on.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes bya ba de lta bu la @236a * //üîΩsogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes bya ba de lta bu la @236a * //üîΩsogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes ‚Äúfeeling is characterized by experience‚Äù and so on.üîΩMental attention to the truth of suffering, etc. is mental attention to the truth.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pas ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pas ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yid la byed pa ste /
translated: Attention related to the general characteristics is attention to impermanence, etc.

original: mi rtag pa nyid nas nges par 'byin par byed pa'i bar rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid nas nges par 'byin par byed pa'i bar rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: It is associated with the sixteen aspects, from impermanence to liberation.

original: mos pa'i sgo nas yid la byed kyi yang dag pa'i don gyi sgo nas ma yin pa ni mos pa yid la byed pa ste mi sdug pa nas zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'i bar dag la'o //
analyzed: mos pa'i sgo nas yid la byed kyi yang dag pa'i don gyi sgo nas ma yin pa ni mos pa yid la byed pa ste mi sdug pa nas zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'i bar dag la'o //
translated: Attention related to conviction is attention to the meaning of conviction, not to the meaning of reality. It is attention to the various means of achieving the goal, such as the meditation on the impurities, the meditation on the various components of the body, the meditation on the various elements, the meditation on the twelve factors of dependent origination, the meditation on the spheres, the meditation on the thirty-seven auxiliaries of awakening, the meditation on the ten powers of the Tathagata, the meditation on the four forms of fearlessness, the meditation on the four forms of unhindered knowledge, the meditation on the fourfold knowledge of the TathƒÅgata, the meditation on the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha, the meditation on the four means of conversion, the meditation on the four immeasurables, the meditation on the eight liberations, the meditation on the eight bases of mastery, the meditation on the ten universal bases, the meditation on the four formless states, the meditation on the eight bases of subjugation, the meditation on the four formless states ofÂÆö, the meditation on the ten totalities, and so on.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la yang ba nyid du mos pa la sogs pa bsdu ste /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la yang ba nyid du mos pa la sogs pa bsdu ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the meditation on the accomplishment of the supernormal powers, the meditation on lightness, and so on.

original: dper na rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba ni sa'i 'du shes chung ngur yang byin gyis rlog cing 'du shes tshad med par yang byin gyis rlob la /
analyzed: dper na rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba ni sa'i 'du shes chung ngur yang byin gyis rlog cing 'du shes tshad med par yang byin gyis rlob la /
translated: For example, one who has great supernormal powers and great power can transform the perception of earth to a lesser perception, and can transform it to an immeasurable perception.

original: de 'dod na sa g-yo bar yang byed do zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de 'dod na sa g-yo bar yang byed do zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba lta bu yin no //
translated: If one wishes, one can cause the earth to quake.

original: mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa zhes bya ba ni mi sdug pa dang lhan cig cing 'brel pa ni mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa ste /
analyzed: mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa zhes bya ba ni mi sdug pa dang lhan cig cing 'brel pa ni mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa ste /
translated: That which is associated with the repulsive is the repulsive itself, since it is associated with and related to the repulsive.

original: 'di skad du mi sdug pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed cing thob par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du mi sdug pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed cing thob par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said: immediately after the attention given to the repulsive, one cultivates and attains the enlightenment factor of mindfulness.

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'phags pa'i lam yin pas mos pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam 'byung ba yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'phags pa'i lam yin pas mos pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam 'byung ba yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa yin no //
translated: The enlightenment factor of mindfulness is the noble path. Therefore, this passage explains that the noble path can occur immediately after the attention given to resolve.

original: gal te spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs kho nar 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed kyi mos pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su ni ma yi na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs kho nar 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed kyi mos pa yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su ni ma yi na /
translated: If the noble path is manifested only immediately after the attention given to the general characteristics of the aggregates, and not immediately after the attention given to resolve,üîΩthen why is this passage taught?

original: mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar drang zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar drang zhe na /
translated: How could it be correct to say that one cultivates the enlightenment factor of mindfulness that is accompanied by the unattractive?

original: de phyir mi sdug pas sems btul nas zhes bya ba 'di rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de phyir mi sdug pas sems btul nas zhes bya ba 'di rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore, after one has subdued the mind with the unattractive, etc.üîΩOne cultivates the mind after one has subdued it with the unattractive, etc.

original: sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na sems kyi ji srid tha mar spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed par 'gyur ba'i bar du btul nas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na sems kyi ji srid tha mar spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed par 'gyur ba'i bar du btul nas te /
translated: up to the point where, finally, immediately after attention directed to the general characteristics of the four noble truths, one manifests the noble path.

original: de'i phyir mdo dang 'gal ba med do //üîΩ'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzhan dag na re spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam @236b mngon du byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang spyi
analyzed: de'i phyir mdo dang 'gal ba med do // 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzhan dag na re spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam @236b mngon du byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang spyi
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction with the sutra.üîΩOthers say that immediately after the noble path, one manifests attention directed to the general characteristics of the four noble truths.

original: yid la byed pa kho na mngon du byed do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: yid la byed pa kho na mngon du byed do zhes zer ro //
translated: They say that one manifests the noble path not only immediately after attention directed to the general characteristics of the four noble truths, but also immediately after the noble path, one manifests attention directed to the general characteristics of the four noble truths.

original: re zhig mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: re zhig mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The path of seeing is called the stage of the path of application prayogabhumi because it is the final stage of the path of application.üîΩThe path of seeing is called the stage of the path of seeing dar≈õanamƒÅrga because it is the first stage to directly see the four truths.üîΩThe path of meditation is called the stage of the path of meditation because it is the stage of meditation on the four truths.üîΩThe path of no more learning is called the stage of the path of no more learning because it is the stage of the result of no more learning.

original: mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan khyad par can gyis gsum la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni nye ba'i phyir lam de rnams kyi mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i spyi yid la byed pa thos pa las byung ba'am bsams pa las byung ba mngon du byed par 'gyurüîΩna / gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas te /
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan khyad par can gyis gsum la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni nye ba'i phyir lam de rnams kyi mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i spyi yid la byed pa thos pa las byung ba'am bsams pa las byung ba mngon du byed par 'gyur na / gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas te /
translated: The path of seeing is called the stage of the path of application because it is the final stage of the path of application.üîΩThe path of seeing is called the stage of the path of seeing because it is the first stage to directly see the four truths.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na go ji ltar te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na go ji ltar te /
translated: The path of meditation is called the stage of the path of meditation because it is the stage of meditation on the four truths.üîΩThe path of no more learning is called the stage of the path of no more learning because it is the stage of the result of no more learning.

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su spyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed par 'gyur na 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mi nus so zhes bya ba ni mngon du bya bar zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su spyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed par 'gyur na 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mi nus so zhes bya ba ni mngon du bya bar zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
translated: How can one manifest the general mental attention immediately after the noble path? One cannot manifest the general mental attention of the desire realm.üîΩ

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it that one does not manifest the general mental attention immediately after the noble path?

original: bsam gtan dang pos bar du chod pa nyid kyis shin tu bskal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang pos bar du chod pa nyid kyis shin tu bskal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is too remote, since the first absorption intervenes.

original: khyod bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sa pa kho na mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur na de'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs par de dag gi sa pa yang ma thob po zhes bya bar smos te /üîΩnges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'am /
analyzed: khyod bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sa pa kho na mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur na de'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs par de dag gi sa pa yang ma thob po zhes bya bar smos te / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'am /
translated: If you say that one manifests only those of the second absorption and so on, then he would say: One does not obtain those of the second absorption and so on, except for the factors conducive to penetrative insight.üîΩOne does not obtain those of the second absorption and so on, except for the factors conducive to penetrative insight.

original: mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'i zag pa med pa ni sngon ma thob po //
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'i zag pa med pa ni sngon ma thob po //
translated: One does not obtain the uncontaminated states of the second absorption and so on, or the uncontaminated states of unrestricted access concentration and so on, except for the factors conducive to penetrative insight.

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam rnam pa can du ma gtogs pa ni sngon thob mod kyi de ni 'phags pa'i de las ldang bar byed pa yin par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam rnam pa can du ma gtogs pa ni sngon thob mod kyi de ni 'phags pa'i de las ldang bar byed pa yin par mi 'dod do //
translated: But it is not asserted that it is the state of having arisen from the ƒÅrya path.

original: 'o na ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i spyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i spyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the general mental contemplation of the truths that is conducive to penetrative insight would manifest.

original: de'i phyir 'phags pa ni yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'phags pa ni yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
