translated: Therefore the text says, ‚ÄúIt is not that ƒÅryas do not manifest the state of having arisen from the path of seeing, but it is not that they manifest the state of having arisen from the path of seeing alone.‚Äù

original: gal te ci'i phyir snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te ci'i phyir snyam du sems na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúWhy is that?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu thob zin thob zin pa de'i sbyor ba mngon du byed pa ni rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu thob zin thob zin pa de'i sbyor ba mngon du byed pa ni rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: The text says, ‚ÄúIt is logical that one who has already obtained the result manifests the preparation for that result.‚Äù

original: sbyor ba ni don @237a * //üîΩbyas zin pa'i phyir dang / dman pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni don @237a * // byas zin pa'i phyir dang / dman pa'i phyir la /
translated: The preparation is not logical for one who has already accomplished the purpose.üîΩIt is inferior and the state of having arisen from the path of seeing is superior.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam gyi sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam gyi sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The state of having arisen from the path of seeing is the preparation for the ƒÅrya path.

original: des ni de dang 'dra ba'i spyi'i yid la byed pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: des ni de dang 'dra ba'i spyi'i yid la byed pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: That is, one obtains a general mental attention similar to that, which is similar to the factors conducive to penetrative insight, because it focuses on the four noble truths.

original: zag pa med pa'i lam skye ba'i tshe thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i lam skye ba'i tshe thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that one obtains it when the uncontaminated path arises.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa las thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir spyi yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa las thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir spyi yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: The thought, nirvana is peace, is a general mental attention because it focuses on all aspects of nirvana.

original: de mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam pa'am chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam pa'am mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa mngon du byed par
analyzed: de mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam pa'am chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam pa'am mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa mngon du byed par
translated: One manifests that is, one manifests the thought, all formations are impermanent, all dharmas are devoid of self, or nirvana is peace, immediately after the arya path.

original: 'gyur ro // de skad du ni mi brjod do //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de skad du ni mi brjod do //
translated: That is not said.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa 'di dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la rag las nas 'thob pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa 'di dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la rag las nas 'thob pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because these mental attentions to a generality that is similar to that are obtained in dependence on the factors conducive to penetrative insight.üîΩIt is well known that they are not obtained in dependence on the uncontaminated path.

original: 'di dag zag pa med pa'i lam du rag lus te 'thob pa ni ma yin no zhes grag go //üîΩmi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la de'i sa pa zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag zag pa med pa'i lam du rag lus te 'thob pa ni ma yin no zhes grag go // mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la de'i sa pa zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'o //
translated: The Abhidharmakosa states,üîΩThe formless realm is four: the summit of existence, nothingness,üîΩthe base of infinite consciousness, and the base of infinite space.

original: de'i sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa ste /
translated: The formless realm is four types: the summit of existence bhavagra, the base of nothingness aki√±canyayatana, the base of infinite consciousness vijnanaanantayatana and the base of infinite space akasanantyayatana.

original: gal te srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa zhig yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa zhig yin na'o //
translated: If one is born in the summit of existence, then the mind of withdrawal is either of its level or the summit of existence.üîΩThe mind of withdrawal is either of the level of the base of nothingness or the summit of existence.

original: sa lhag ma rnams su ni ldang ba'i sems rang gi sa pa kho na yin gyi gzhan gyis pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sa lhag ma rnams su ni ldang ba'i sems rang gi sa pa kho na yin gyi gzhan gyis pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The remaining levels have only their own level as the mind of withdrawal, not other levels.

original: gzhan gyi sa pa ni sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa ni sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because those of other levels are to be accomplished through preparation,

original: rang gi sa pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung bas so //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung bas so //
translated: and those of one‚Äôs own level arise without preparation.

original: sbyor ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement, ‚Äúbecause it depends on preparation‚Äù?

original: 'phags pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam mo //
translated: It means the ƒÅrya path.

original: lam gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa yang mngon du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: lam gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa yang mngon du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: Immediately after the path, that obtained from birth in the desire realm manifests.

original: khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can //
analyzed: khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúafflicted of the three realms‚Äù is explained in full as follows.

original: zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni grangs bzhin @237b du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni grangs bzhin @237b du bstan pa yin te /
translated: The explanation is in accordance with the order of the text.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni sems drug rnyed de so sor rnyed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni sems drug rnyed de so sor rnyed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Six minds are obtained in the desire realm: six are individually obtained.

original: gzugs na spyod pa la yang drug go //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa la yang drug go //
translated: Six are obtained in the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa la ni gnyis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa la ni gnyis so //
translated: Two are obtained in the formless realm.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúafflicted‚Äù in the desire realm.

original: sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa'i gang zag go //
analyzed: sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa'i gang zag go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúone who does not possess these six types of mind‚Äù refers to a person who does not possess these six types of mind.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: 'di na dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'am the tshom gyis yin te /
analyzed: 'di na dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'am the tshom gyis yin te /
translated: Here, the reconnection of the roots of virtue is due to right view or doubt.

original: de gal te the tshom gyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed na /
analyzed: de gal te the tshom gyis nying mtshams sbyor bar byed na /
translated: If one is reborn due to doubt,

original: de la the tshom dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di'i srid pa bar ma nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la gdon mi za bar dge ba de rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la the tshom dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di'i srid pa bar ma nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la gdon mi za bar dge ba de rnyed pa yin no //
translated: then when the afflicted mind that is concomitant with doubt becomes manifest, and when one returns to the desire realm from the form realm or the formless realm, then at that time, one necessarily acquires that virtue in the afflicted mind that connects one to the intermediate existence.

original: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni skabs yin pa'i phyir dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang logs shig nas 'byung ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag kho na yin te /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni skabs yin pa'i phyir dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang logs shig nas 'byung ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag kho na yin te /
translated: Nonvirtuous and obscured neutral minds of the desire realm alone are obtained, because this is the context and because obscured neutral minds of the form realm are mentioned separately.

original: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa de dag dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can te /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa de dag dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can te /
translated: Obtained means obtained from nonvirtuous and obscured neutral minds of the desire realm and afflicted minds of the form realm.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is obtained?

original: rnyed ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnyed ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The context indicates that it is the meditative attainment of cessation.üîΩHow is it obtained?

original: ji ltar rnyed ce na khams su slar ldog pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed ce na khams su slar ldog pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The text says: From returning to the realm and from degeneration.

original: gang gi tshe gzugs kyi khams sam /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs kyi khams sam /
translated: When one returns to the desire realm from the form realm or

original: gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag las gang yang rung ba zhig tu mngon du gyur
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag las gang yang rung ba zhig tu mngon du gyur
translated: When one returns to the desire realm from the formless realm, at that time, when the afflicted mind that links existence in the intermediate state manifests as either a nonvirtuous mind or a obscured neutral mind, then they definitely obtain those nonvirtuous and obscured neutral minds that they did not possess previously, because they degenerated.üîΩObtaining them from degeneration

original: pa na gdon mi za bar sngon rnam par nyams pa'i phyir de dag dang mi ldan pa las mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa na gdon mi za bar sngon rnam par nyams pa'i phyir de dag dang mi ldan pa las mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one degenerates from freedom from attachment to the desire realm, at that time, if the mind of degeneration manifests, then they obtain those afflicted minds that they did not possess previously.

original: yongs su nyams pa las @238a * //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las @238a * //
translated: Obtaining them from birth

original: gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di la yongs su nyams pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las nyon mongs pa can de dag rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di la yongs su nyams pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las nyon mongs pa can de dag rnyed pa yin no //
translated: When one is born in the desire realm from the formless realm, at that time, if the mind of birth manifests as either a nonvirtuous mind or a obscured neutral mind, then they definitely obtain those nonvirtuous and obscured neutral minds that they did not possess previously, because they degenerated.

original: khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can ni gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di'i srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la gdon mi zaüîΩbar de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can sngon nyams pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can ni gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'dod pa'i khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di'i srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la gdon mi za bar de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can sngon nyams pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one returns to the form realm from the formless realm, the afflicted mind of the intermediate existence linking at death is definitely afflicted.üîΩWithout doubt, one obtains the afflicted mind of the form realm that was previously lost.

original: yongs su nyams pa las ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one degenerates from the state of freedom from attachment to the desire realm through the mind of the desire realm, one obtains the afflicted mind of the form realm that was not previously possessed.

original: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs med pa
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs med pa
translated: When one degenerates from freedom from attachment to the formless realm through the mind of the desire realm, then at that time one possesses the formless realm afflictions that arise from the desire realm.üîΩ

original: na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one degenerates from freedom from attachment to the formless realm through the mind of the desire realm, then at that time one obtains the formless realm afflicted mind that one did not previously possess.

original: slob pa yang yongs su nyams pa las zhes bya ba skabs dang sbyar te /
analyzed: slob pa yang yongs su nyams pa las zhes bya ba skabs dang sbyar te /
translated: When one degenerates from the state of a learner,

original: gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di de dang mi ldan pa las slob pa'i sems rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe 'di de dang mi ldan pa las slob pa'i sems rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: one obtains the learner mind that one did not previously possess.

original: de ltar na re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las sems drug rnyed par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las sems drug rnyed par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus it has been explained that when the desire realm afflicted mind manifests, one obtains six minds that one did not previously possess.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na yang de dag dang mi ldan pa las drug rnyed do //üîΩgzugs na spyod pa gsum zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i khams nas gzugs kyi khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na yang de dag dang mi ldan pa las drug rnyed do // gzugs na spyod pa gsum zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i khams nas gzugs kyi khams su slar ldog pa de'i tshe 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi
translated: When manifesting a form realm afflicted mind, one obtains six minds not previously possessed.

original: sems la gdon mi za bar gzugs na spyod pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sems la gdon mi za bar gzugs na spyod pa gsum ste /
translated: When one returns from the formless realm to the form realm, at that time, when linking with an afflicted mind of the form realm intermediate existence, one definitely possesses three form realm minds.

original: skyes nas @238b thob pa'i dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang thob pa sngar skye ba yod pa'i phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul ba'i sems kho na dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'iüîΩnyon mongs pa can dang slob pa rnyed de /
analyzed: skyes nas @238b thob pa'i dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang thob pa sngar skye ba yod pa'i phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul ba'i sems kho na dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa rnyed de /
translated: One also obtains an afflicted formless realm mind and a learner mind when one regresses from the state of an arhat by a form realm mind.

original: de ltar na gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed par bshad pa yin no /üîΩ// / bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed par bshad pa yin no / // / bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
translated: Thus it is explained that six minds are obtained in the form realm when an afflicted mind arises.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni de dag dang mi ldan pa las gnyis rnyed de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni de dag dang mi ldan pa las gnyis rnyed de /
translated: Two minds are obtained in the formless realm when an afflicted formless realm mind arises from a desire realm emanation mind and from a form realm mind when one regresses from the state of an arhat.

original: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pas gang gi phyogs gcig mngon du gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang slob pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pas gang gi phyogs gcig mngon du gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang slob pa'o //
translated: One who regresses from the state of an arhat through the mind of the formless realm possesses two minds: the afflicted mind of the form realm that is the object of regression and the mind of a learner.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba la sems gsum zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba la sems gsum zhes bya ba la /
translated: Three minds are obtained in relation to virtuous minds of the form realm.

original: dge ba la zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan par zad de /
analyzed: dge ba la zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan par zad de /
translated: The term virtuous is a general indication.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba 'ga' la ci rigs par gsum rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba 'ga' la ci rigs par gsum rnyed pa yin no //
translated: Three minds are obtained in relation to any virtuous mind of the form realm, as appropriate.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this?

original: re zhig gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems dang po mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba de nyid rnyed la /
analyzed: re zhig gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems dang po mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba de nyid rnyed la /
translated: First, when a virtuous mind of the form realm manifests, one obtains that virtuous mind of the form realm that one did not previously possess.

original: dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed de /
analyzed: dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na de dag dang mi ldan pa las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed de /
translated: If one manifests a virtuous mind that is included in the actual basis of absorption, then one obtains both unobscured neutral minds of emanation active in the desire realm and form realm that are not possessed.

original: de ltar na gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na gsum rnyed do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na gsum rnyed do zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus it is said that if one manifests a virtuous mind active in the form realm, one obtains three.

original: gsum po cig car du rnyed do zhes bya ba srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsum po cig car du rnyed do zhes bya ba srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to obtain three simultaneously.

original: slob pa la bzhi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni slob pa'i sems sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i sems mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las slob pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid de nyid
analyzed: slob pa la bzhi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni slob pa'i sems sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i sems mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las slob pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid de nyid
translated: Obtaining four when manifesting a learner mind and so on means that if one manifests a learner mind that is perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering, then one obtains that learner mind itself, which is the collection of perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering, that is not possessed.

original: rnyed do // 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang @239a * //
analyzed: rnyed do // 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang @239a * //
translated: One also obtains both unobscured neutral minds active in the desire realm and form realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba yang rnyed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba yang rnyed do //
translated: Also, they obtain formless realm virtuous minds.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na'o //
translated: When they are freed from attachment to the desire realm and form realm by the ƒÅrya path.

original: ji lta zhe na /üîΩgang gi tshe 'di mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe slob pa'i sems rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pas bsdus pa mngon du gyur pa na de dag dang mi ldan pa las
analyzed: ji lta zhe na / gang gi tshe 'di mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe slob pa'i sems rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pas bsdus pa mngon du gyur pa na de dag dang mi ldan pa las
translated: How?üîΩWhen they are freed from attachment to the desire realm by the ƒÅrya path of unrestricted access concentration, then they obtain both desire realm and form realm unobscured neutral minds that are minds emanating emanations, since they manifest the ninth liberated path subsumed by the learner mind.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed la /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed la /
translated: They obtain these minds that they did not previously possess.

original: gang gi tshe sa drug pa'i 'phags pa'i lam rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis gzugs las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe slob pa'i sems rnam pa dang po mngon du gyur pa na de dang mi ldan pa la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
analyzed: gang gi tshe sa drug pa'i 'phags pa'i lam rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis gzugs las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe slob pa'i sems rnam pa dang po mngon du gyur pa na de dang mi ldan pa la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
translated: When aryas on the sixth or higher level who are free from attachment to the form realm by any of the arya paths manifest the first moment of a learner mind, they possess past and future states of that level.üîΩ

original: pa 'thob pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems rnyed do //
analyzed: pa 'thob pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems rnyed do //
translated: When one becomes free from attachment to the form realm by any of the arya paths of the sixth stage, at that time, when the first aspect of the mind of the learner manifests, one obtains the virtuous mind of the formless realm through the method of obtaining past and future minds not previously possessed.

original: 'phags pa'i lam zhes smos pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtsal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam zhes smos pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtsal ba'i phyir te /
translated: The term ‚Äúarhat path‚Äù is mentioned because it seeks the contaminated mind.

original: rnyed pa 'di ni slob pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa yin par bshad do //
analyzed: rnyed pa 'di ni slob pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa yin par bshad do //
translated: This is explained as the manifestation of the mind of the learner.

original: 'di la slob dpon yon tan blo gros na re /
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon yon tan blo gros na re /
translated: Master Gu·πáamati says:

original: slob pa la bzhi /
analyzed: slob pa la bzhi /
translated: Learners have four.

original: slob pa de nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: slob pa de nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: when freed from attachment to the desire realm and form realm by the arya path, obtain the unobscured neutral states of the desire realm and form realm and the virtue of the formless realm.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To explain,

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na ste /
translated: when freed from attachment to the desire realm and form realm by the arya path,

original: gang gi tshe 'di mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gang yin pa de ni dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyi sa pa'i lam gyi slob pa
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de'i tshe rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gang yin pa de ni dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyi sa pa'i lam gyi slob pa
translated: when freed from attachment to the desire realm by the arya path of unrestricted access concentration, then the ninth liberated path is the learner path of the level of the actual basis of absorption.

original: 'thob pas slob pa rnyed ces bya la /
analyzed: 'thob pas slob pa rnyed ces bya la /
translated: Since it is obtained, it is called obtained by the learner.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag kyang kho na'i tshe rnyed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag kyang kho na'i tshe rnyed do //
translated: One also obtains the two unobscured neutral minds of the desire and form realms, which are emanating minds.

original: sa drug gi 'phags @239b pa'i lam gyis gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed pa yin no zhes zer la /
analyzed: sa drug gi 'phags @239b pa'i lam gyis gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed pa yin no zhes zer la /
translated: When one is free from attachment to the form realm by means of the ƒÅrya path of the six stages, one obtains the virtuous mind of the formless realm that is the ninth liberated path.

original: de'i slob ma dpon dbyig bshes yang don de kho na dag de dang tshig dang yi ge dag kho na 'dri bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i slob ma dpon dbyig bshes yang don de kho na dag de dang tshig dang yi ge dag kho na 'dri bar byed do //
translated: His student, master Vasumitra, also wrote that very meaning in just those words and letters.

original: bshad pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This explanation is illogical.

original: de ltar tshig gcig tu bshad na don rung ba ma yin gyi tshig tha dad par ni rung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar tshig gcig tu bshad na don rung ba ma yin gyi tshig tha dad par ni rung ngo //
translated: If it is explained in one word, it is not suitable, but if it is explained in different words, it is suitable.

original: slob pa de nyid ces bya ba ni tshig gcig yin no //
analyzed: slob pa de nyid ces bya ba ni tshig gcig yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat learner‚Äù is one word.

original: 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba nas 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba'i bar ni tshig gzhan yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba nas 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba'i bar ni tshig gzhan yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe path of the ƒÅryas‚Äù up to ‚Äúunobscured indeterminate states of the desire realm and the form realm‚Äù is a different reading.

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis ni gong du slob pa de nyid ces bshad pa de khyad par du bya ba ma yin te tshig tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis ni gong du slob pa de nyid ces bshad pa de khyad par du bya ba ma yin te tshig tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwhen the path of the ƒÅryas causes one to become free from attachment to the desire realm and the form realm‚Äù is a different reading.

original: ldan pa min las rnyed ces bya ba byung ba'i phyir sems kyis rnyed pa 'di ni de dang mi ldan pa las yin par brjod na /
analyzed: ldan pa min las rnyed ces bya ba byung ba'i phyir sems kyis rnyed pa 'di ni de dang mi ldan pa las yin par brjod na /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúone obtains it from a nonassociated factor‚Äù is a different reading.

original: de ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i gang zag la slob pa'i sems rnyed par rnam par gzhag dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyi slob pa sngon med pa rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam zhe na /üîΩha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin te /
analyzed: de ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i gang zag la slob pa'i sems rnyed par rnam par gzhag dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyi slob pa sngon med pa rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam zhe na / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin te /
translated: It is not because of the absurd consequence that it would be necessary to say that he obtains the learner mind of the actual basis of absorption that has not previously been obtained.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyis pa sngon med pa'ang rnyed par 'gyur bas de yang rnyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan gyis pa sngon med pa'ang rnyed par 'gyur bas de yang rnyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it would follow that it would be necessary to say that he obtains the virtuous mind of the form realm that is the actual basis of absorption that has not previously been obtained.üîΩThe master P≈´r·πáavardhana says:

original: slob dpon dbyig bshes na re slob pa'i sems la gnas pa 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba ni nges pa la 'jug pa'i dro bar gyur pa'i gnas skabs nyid na thob zin pa'i phyir mi bgrang ngo zhes zer
analyzed: slob dpon dbyig bshes na re slob pa'i sems la gnas pa 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba ni nges pa la 'jug pa'i dro bar gyur pa'i gnas skabs nyid na thob zin pa'i phyir mi bgrang ngo zhes zer
translated: When one abiding in the learner mind is free from attachment to the desire realm, the virtuous mind of the form realm is not counted because it is already obtained in the state of heat that is the entry to the definite emergence of the learner mind.

original: ro // de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ro // de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: slob pa'ang mi bgrang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob pa'ang mi bgrang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not be counted as a learner.

original: slob pa'ang mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs dang po na thob zin pas khyod kyis de ltar rnam par mi gzhag par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //üîΩgang gi phyir slob dpon nyid @240a * //
analyzed: slob pa'ang mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs dang po na thob zin pas khyod kyis de ltar rnam par mi gzhag par bya dgos par 'gyur ro // gang gi phyir slob dpon nyid @240a * //
translated: You would have to posit that even a learner who has already obtained it at the first stage of the path of seeing does not obtain it.

original: kyis spel ma'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa kho na las /
analyzed: kyis spel ma'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa kho na las /
translated: Because the master himself explains in the very same explanatory verses:

original: nges 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe //
analyzed: nges 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe //
translated: When entering the state of an arhat,üîΩone is a learner and a nonlearner.

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa'o zhes bshad pa de'i phyir yang nyes par bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa'o zhes bshad pa de'i phyir yang nyes par bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
translated: Therefore it is definitely explained that this is a fault.

original: lhag mar bcas pas lhag ma ste zhes bya ba ni sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lhag mar bcas pas lhag ma ste zhes bya ba ni sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The remaining are those that remain, that is, those not explained as obtained.

original: ji lta bur zhe na re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems la sems 'di rnyed cing rnyed cing rnyed do zhes ma bshad pas de la ni de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji lta bur zhe na re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems la sems 'di rnyed cing rnyed cing rnyed do zhes ma bshad pas de la ni de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
translated: How? It is not explained that the mind that obtains that mind is obtained in the desire realm. Therefore it is obtained there alone and not elsewhere.

original: dper na yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na /
analyzed: dper na yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems mngon du gyur na /
translated: For example, when one who has not yet obtained the root of virtue through right view manifests a virtuous mind of the desire realm,

original: de dang mi ldan pa las dge ba'i sems de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan nyon mongs pa can dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang mi ldan pa las dge ba'i sems de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan nyon mongs pa can dag ni ma yin te /
translated: one obtains that virtuous mind alone, not other afflicted minds,

original: khams gsum char yang sngar thob zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum char yang sngar thob zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the three realms have already been obtained.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Also, it is not unobscured neutral mind of the desire realm,

original: rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i thob pa ni lhan cig skye ba yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i thob pa ni lhan cig skye ba yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the obtainment of karmic maturation and so on is obtained simultaneously and

original: sprul pa'i sems ni thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sems ni thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the mind of emanation is not obtained.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba la sogs pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag kyang ma yin te thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba la sogs pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag kyang ma yin te thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, it is not virtuous minds of the form and formless realms, nor is it learner or nonlearner minds, because they are not obtained.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yang de rnyed par bshad de /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yang de rnyed par bshad de /
translated: It is explained that when a desire realm unobscured neutral mind is obtained,

original: de la yang de dang mi ldan pa las de kho na rnyed pa yin te /üîΩlung bstan min 'thob lhan cig skye //
analyzed: de la yang de dang mi ldan pa las de kho na rnyed pa yin te / lung bstan min 'thob lhan cig skye //
translated: it is obtained from not possessing it.üîΩObtained from birth is neutral.

original: zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdge ba la sogs pa gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // dge ba la sogs pa gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
translated: Obtained from birth is neutral alone, because it is said:üîΩObtained from birth is neutral.

original: sngar thob zin pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin nyid du kha cig thob pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar thob zin pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin nyid du kha cig thob pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: Other virtuous minds and so on are not obtained, because they are already obtained and because some are not obtained in that way.

original: sprul ba'i sems mngon du gyur na ni //üîΩ'ga' yang rnyed pa med pas de ni brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sprul ba'i sems mngon du gyur na ni // 'ga' yang rnyed pa med pas de ni brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: When a mind of emanation is manifest,üîΩit is not obtained, because it is not obtained from any other mind.

original: nyon mongs pa can nam gzhan yang rung gang la 'ga' yang thob pa med pa de ni brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can nam gzhan yang rung gang la 'ga' yang thob pa med pa de ni brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: It is not obtained from any other mind, whether it is afflicted or not.

original: khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na la drug na la drug nas gnyis kyi bar rnyed la /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na la drug na la drug nas gnyis kyi bar rnyed la /
translated: If one possesses six, one obtains two to six.

original: gdon mi za ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges par gzung ngo //
translated: But it is not definite that one obtains six.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la @240b lung du ma bstan pa mngon du gyur na yang /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la @240b lung du ma bstan pa mngon du gyur na yang /
translated: If an unobscured neutral mind of the form realm manifests,

original: de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
translated: one obtains that alone and not others.

original: snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be stated as before.

original: de bzhin du gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa dang pos bsdus pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs mngon du gyur na yang de dang mi ldan pa las de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /üîΩkha cig ni sngar thob zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa dang pos bsdus pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs mngon du gyur na yang de dang mi ldan pa las de kho na rnyed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te / kha cig ni sngar thob zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the first type of virtuous mind of the formless realm subsumed by the first type manifests, one obtains that alone and not others.

original: kha cig ni thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni thob pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because some are obtained previously and some are not obtained.

original: de bzhin du ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang mi slob pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang mi slob pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be stated in the same way for unobscured neutral minds and nonlearner minds.

original: gzhan dag ni khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni spel ma byed pa dag go //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni spel ma byed pa dag go //
translated: Others are called ‚Äúwithout distinction‚Äù because they are mixed.

original: khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa so sor ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med par zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa so sor ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Without distinction means that they are not distinguished as being the afflicted and so on of the three realms.

original: dge ba'i sems la bdun yin te //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems la bdun yin te //
translated: Seven are in a virtuous mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bshad pa gang yin pa de ma tshang ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bshad pa gang yin pa de ma tshang ba yin te /
translated: This is incomplete because it does not explain the characteristics.

original: dge ba ni khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa yin la de la /üîΩdge ba'i sems la bdun yin te /
analyzed: dge ba ni khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa yin la de la / dge ba'i sems la bdun yin te /
translated: Virtuous minds are in the three realms and uncontaminated.

original: zhes brjod par bya'i drug yin te zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'i drug yin te zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It should say ‚Äúseven are in a virtuous mind,‚Äù not ‚Äúsix are in a virtuous mind.‚Äù

original: ji lta zhe na de bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na de bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: How is that? To explain that, he says, ‚ÄúIn the desire realm, virtuous minds arise from seven.‚Äù

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba las zhes bya ba 'di bshad zin to //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba las zhes bya ba 'di bshad zin to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the linking of roots of virtue‚Äù has already been explained.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol ba'i lam
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol ba'i lam
translated: The phrase ‚Äúunobscured and neutral minds of the desire realm and form realm‚Äù refers to the obtainment of the minds of emanation of the desire and form realms that are not possessed by those who are free from attachment to the desire realm through the mundane or transcendent paths.

original: dgu pa la de dag dang mi ldan pa las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed pa yin no //üîΩde na yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa las gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag go zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe dang po nyid du gzugs na spyod pa mi lcogs pa med pa 'thob pa de'i tshe gzugs na spyod pa'i dge
analyzed: dgu pa la de dag dang mi ldan pa las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed pa yin no // de na yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa las gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag go zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe dang po nyid du gzugs na spyod pa mi lcogs pa med pa 'thob pa de'i tshe gzugs na spyod pa'i dge
translated: This is because the ninth liberated path of the stage of an ordinary being is a mundane path.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe virtuous minds of the form and formless realms‚Äù refers to the obtainment of the virtuous minds of the form and formless realms.üîΩThe obtainment of the virtuous mind of the form realm occurs when one first obtains unrestricted access concentration to the form realm.

original: ba rnyed la gang gi tshe dang po nyid du nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi nyer bsngogs thob pa de'i tshe gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed do //
analyzed: ba rnyed la gang gi tshe dang po nyid du nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi nyer bsngogs thob pa de'i tshe gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed do //
translated: The obtainment of the virtuous mind of the formless realm occurs when one first obtains access concentration to infinite space.

original: @241a * // nges 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe //
analyzed: @241a * // nges 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe //
translated: When entering the state of definite separation and when attaining the state of an arhat,

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nges pa la 'jug pa de'i tshe ni slob pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs rnyed la /
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe nges pa la 'jug pa de'i tshe ni slob pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs rnyed la /
translated: one obtains the seven mentioned previously and the learner mind of Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering and the nonlearner mind of the knowledge of elimination.

original: gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa de'i tshe ni mi slob pa zad par shes pa'i tshogs rnyed de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa de'i tshe ni mi slob pa zad par shes pa'i tshogs rnyed de /
translated: When one obtains the state of an arhat, one obtains the nonlearner mind of the knowledge of elimination.üîΩThus, in these states, one obtains the seven minds explained previously, which one did not previously possess.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.

analyzed: de ltar na gnas skabs 'di dag tu ji skad bshad pa'i sems bdun po dag dang mi ldan pa las ldan pa rnyed par 'gyur ro // lhag ma ni rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ni bdag gis bshad pa 'di kho na las rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: The remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.

translated: The remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe remainder should be understood from this very explanation.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis dgu rnyed brjod //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis dgu rnyed brjod //
translated: The remainder should be understood from this very explanation.üîΩThe

original: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du gnyis pa lung du ma bstan la de nyid do zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du gnyis pa lung du ma bstan la de nyid do zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: So too, the second is neutral.

original: khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni de dag dang mi ldan pa las dgu rnyed de /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni de dag dang mi ldan pa las dgu rnyed de /
translated: One obtains nine from not possessing those in afflicted states of the three realms.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgribs pa dang slob pa zhes bya ba dgu po dag ci rigs par rnyed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgribs pa dang slob pa zhes bya ba dgu po dag ci rigs par rnyed do //
translated: One obtains nine: the four active in the desire realm, the three active in the form realm, and the obscured and learner minds active in the formless realm.

original: ci rigs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /üîΩ'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la dge ba'i sems nying mtshams sbyor ba dang khams su slar ldog pa nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed do //
analyzed: ci rigs pa'i don ni 'di yin te / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la dge ba'i sems nying mtshams sbyor ba dang khams su slar ldog pa nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba rnyed do //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúas appropriate‚Äù is as follows.üîΩOne obtains a desire realm virtuous mind from linking with a desire realm virtuous mind and from returning to the realm.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na la khams su slar ldog pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag rnyed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na la khams su slar ldog pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag rnyed do //
translated: One obtains a desire realm nonvirtuous mind and an obscured neutral mind from returning to the realm and from complete degeneration while possessing a desire realm afflicted mind.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed do //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa sprul pa'i sems dag rnyed do //
translated: When one returns to the realm from a form realm afflicted mind, one obtains a form realm virtuous mind and a desire realm unobscured neutral mind of emanation.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nam gzugs na spyod pa'ang rung ba la khams su slar ldog pa'am /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nam gzugs na spyod pa'ang rung ba la khams su slar ldog pa'am /
translated: When one returns to the realm from a desire realm afflicted mind or a form realm mind,

original: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nyid do //
translated: one obtains a form realm afflicted mind through degeneration.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nam /üîΩgzugs na spyod @241b pa'am /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can nam / gzugs na spyod @241b pa'am /
translated: When one degenerates from a desire realm afflicted mind,

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang rung ba la yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa dag rnyed do //üîΩde lta bu ni ci rigs pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang rung ba la yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa dag rnyed do // de lta bu ni ci rigs pa'i don yin no //
translated: a form realm mind, or an formless realm mind, one obtains a formless realm afflicted mind and a learner mind.üîΩThis is the meaning of ‚Äúas is appropriate.‚Äù

original: lung ma bstan pa de nyid do //
analyzed: lung ma bstan pa de nyid do //
translated: That very neutral mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma gang yin pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ba kho na ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma gang yin pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ba kho na ste /
translated: Whatever remains is just as before.

original: khams gsum pa'i lung du ma bstan pa rnams la gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las lung du ma bstan pa'i de kho na rnyed de /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i lung du ma bstan pa rnams la gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na de dang mi ldan pa las lung du ma bstan pa'i de kho na rnyed de /
translated: When any unobscured neutral state of the three realms manifests, it is obtained from not possessing that neutral state.

original: grub pa'i mtha' las /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' las /
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge declares:

original: lung bstan mi 'thob lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: lung bstan mi 'thob lhan cig skyes //
translated: Unobscured neutral states are obtained from birth.üîΩThe verse summary states:

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang // bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni zhes bya ba thams cad 'byung ba las skye ba'i tshe ni khams su slar ldog pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang // bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni zhes bya ba thams cad 'byung ba las skye ba'i tshe ni khams su slar ldog pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When arising, it is obtained from the elements.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa las ni de na yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa las ni de na yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When entering meditative attainment, it is obtained from existing there.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When free from attachment, it is obtained from freedom from attachment to desire realm attachment.

original: yongs su nyams pa'i tshe ni yongs su nyams pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa'i tshe ni yongs su nyams pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When one degenerates, it is said, ‚Äúfrom the state of having degenerated.‚Äù

original: dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni the tshom dang yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni the tshom dang yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When one reconnects with virtue, it is said, ‚Äúfrom the state of connecting with virtue through doubt and right view.‚Äù

original: sems rnyed ces bya ba ni sems so sor thob pa'o //
analyzed: sems rnyed ces bya ba ni sems so sor thob pa'o //
translated: Obtaining mind refers to obtaining the mind.

original: de ldan pa min las zhes bya ba ni gang zag ste /
analyzed: de ldan pa min las zhes bya ba ni gang zag ste /
translated: The person refers to the state of not possessing those.

original: de dag dang mi ldan pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag dang mi ldan pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúfrom the state of not possessing those.‚Äù

original: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon rgyal po'i sras grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon rgyal po'i sras grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o /

original: tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs chen pa rnams ni dang po yin no //
analyzed: tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs chen pa rnams ni dang po yin no //
translated: The first absorption has three specific realms: the Brahmakayika, Brahmapurohita, and Mahabrahma heavens.

original: 'od chung pa rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams ni gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: 'od chung pa rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams ni gnyis pa yin no //
translated: The second absorption has three specific realms: Parittabha, Apramanabha, and Abhasvara.

original: dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams ni gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams ni gsum pa yin no //
translated: The third absorption has three specific realms: Paritta shubha, Apramanashubha, and Shubhakrisna.

original: sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams ni bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams ni bzhi pa yin no //
translated: The fourth absorption has three specific realms: Anabhraka, Punyaprasava, and Brhatphala.

original: chen po de nyid zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang spel ba'i sgo nas chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang / shin tu chen po dang / ches shin tu chen po tha dad pa'i bye brag gi gnas gzhan lnga ste /
analyzed: chen po de nyid zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang spel ba'i sgo nas chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang / shin tu chen po dang / ches shin tu chen po tha dad pa'i bye brag gi gnas gzhan lnga ste /
translated: The great one is divided into five stages, small, medium, great, exceedingly great, and extremely great, by combining it with uncontaminated absorption.

original: mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min rnams so //
analyzed: mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min rnams so //
translated: The Akani·π£·π≠ha gods are the highest gods.

original: de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa ni sa brgyad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa ni sa brgyad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the fourth absorption is called the eighth stage.

original: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po las skyes pa'i phyir tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po las skyes pa'i phyir tshangs pa'o //
translated: Brahma is so called because it is born from great roots of virtue.

original: de yang gang zhe na tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: What is that? It is called MahƒÅbrahma.

original: bsam gtan khyad par can thob pas thog mar skye zhing tha mar 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir dang / snga ma dang khyad par yod pa'i phyir chen po yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par can thob pas thog mar skye zhing tha mar 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir dang / snga ma dang khyad par yod pa'i phyir chen po yin no //
translated: It is great because it is the first to be born and the last to die by attaining the special absorption, and because it is superior to the previous ones.

original: 'di dag la de'i ris na gnas pa yod pas tshangs ris pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag la de'i ris na gnas pa yod pas tshangs ris pa rnams so //

original: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pas na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams so //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pas na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams so //
translated: They are called Brahmapurohita because they are the priests of BrahmƒÅ.

original: 'di dag la tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis tshangs pa chen po yod pas na tshangs pa chen po rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag la tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis tshangs pa chen po yod pas na tshangs pa chen po rnams so //

original: 'di dag la 'od gsal gyi sa la ltos nas 'od chung ngu yod pas na 'od chung rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag la 'od gsal gyi sa la ltos nas 'od chung ngu yod pas na 'od chung rnams so //

original: 'di dag ni 'od tshad gzung bar mi nus pas na tshad med 'od rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'od tshad gzung bar mi nus pas na tshad med 'od rnams so //
translated: They are called ApramƒÅ·πáƒÅbha because their light cannot be measured.

original: gnas gzhan zad par snang bar byed pa'i phyir 'od gsal rnams so //
analyzed: gnas gzhan zad par snang bar byed pa'i phyir 'od gsal rnams so //

original: yid kyi sa pa'i bde ba la ni dge ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yid kyi sa pa'i bde ba la ni dge ba zhes bya ste /
translated: The pleasure of the mental faculty is called virtue.

original: 'di dag la gzhan gyi sa la ltos na de chung ngu yod pas na dge chung rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag la gzhan gyi sa la ltos na de chung ngu yod pas na dge chung rnams so //

analyzed: 'di dag la 'bras bu gnas gzhan dang 'brel pa so so'i skye bo pa thams cad pas mchog tu gyur pa chen po yod pas na 'bras bu che rnams so //

analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir gnas gtsang ma ste /

analyzed: yang na bdag nyid kyis bdag gi gnas dus nya nye zhig na spong zhing 'dor bar mi byed pas na mi che ba rnams so //

analyzed: yang na bsam pa dge ba'i phyir gzhan dag la gdung bar mi byed pas na mi gdung ba rnams so //

original: mthong ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir shin tu mthong bas na gya nom snang rnams so //
analyzed: mthong ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir shin tu mthong bas na gya nom snang rnams so //

analyzed: lta ba bzang ba'i phyir shin tu mthong rnams so //
translated: The gods of the fourth meditation are called the gods of no thought because they are endowed with the meditative attainment of non-perception.

analyzed: gong mar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro // 'dis ni gnas pa dag bstan na /

analyzed: ji ltar de ltar na gnas bcu bdun po 'di dag ces bya zhe na /

original: sbags pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bang rim bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sbags pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bang rim bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a terrace‚Äù means like a step.

original: gzhan dag na re 'brog phyogs kyi rdzong bzhin du'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re 'brog phyogs kyi rdzong bzhin du'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: like a fortress in the wilderness.

original: sa gzhan ni med do zhes bya ba ni sa gzhan dang 'brel pa med pas so //
analyzed: sa gzhan ni med do zhes bya ba ni sa gzhan dang 'brel pa med pas so //
translated: There is no other level, because it is not connected with another level.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams ni yul na mi gnas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni gzugs can dag kyang yul na mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams ni yul na mi gnas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni gzugs can dag kyang yul na mi gnas so //
translated: Past and future form and non-informative form do not exist in a place, because past and future form, even though it exists, does not exist in a place.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni gzugs can yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni gzugs can yin la /
translated: Non-informative form is form,

original: da ltar gyi dag kyang yul na mi gnas la /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dag kyang yul na mi gnas la /
translated: but it does not exist in a place, even though it is present.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du da ltar gyi dag yin yang yul na mi gnas na /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du da ltar gyi dag yin yang yul na mi gnas na /
translated: Feeling, etc., which are not form, do not exist in a place, even though they are present.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos so //
translated: What need is there to mention past and future?

original: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //
translated: Four types from arising.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshe rabs gzhan du las kyi grub pa'i phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshe rabs gzhan du las kyi grub pa'i phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba yin te /
translated: Birth is the arising of the aggregates established by karma in another life.

original: des na gzugs med pa'i khams rnam pa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: des na gzugs med pa'i khams rnam pa bzhi yin no //
translated: Thus the formless realm has four types.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:üîΩThe base of infinite space,üîΩand so on.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'i dus na nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam du rnam par byed pa'i phyir nam mkha' mtha' yas te /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'i dus na nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam du rnam par byed pa'i phyir nam mkha' mtha' yas te /
translated: At the time of preparing to enter meditative attainment, one thinks, Space is infinite, and one focuses on that.

original: de'i lam de nyid skye mched yin no //
analyzed: de'i lam de nyid skye mched yin no //
translated: That very path is the base.üîΩSimilarly, one thinks, Consciousness is infinite, and one focuses on that.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa dang ci yang med do snyam du de dag gi rnam par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa dang ci yang med do snyam du de dag gi rnam par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: One thinks, Nothing exists, and one focuses on that.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o //
translated: Thus the base of infinite consciousness and the base of nothingness are so called.

original: 'du shes ni 'bras lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'bras lta bu'o //
translated: Discernment is like a fruit.

original: 'du shes ni zug rngu lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni zug rngu lta bu'o //
translated: Discernment is like a thorn.

original: 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa snyam nas /
analyzed: 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa snyam nas /
translated: The absence of discernment is like complete delusion.

original: 'du shes gzhan pa 'byung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes gzhan pa 'byung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o //
translated: The base of neither perception nor non-perception is so called because another type of perception arises there.

original: de dag la yul gyis byas pa'i bla 'og ni med do zhes bya ba ni yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la yul gyis byas pa'i bla 'og ni med do zhes bya ba ni yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no higher or lower in these states, because they are not located in space.

original: ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi zhes bya ba the tshom 'di ci las gyur ce na 'di la bdag med na 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dag na ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams gzugs @245a * //üîΩla brten nas 'jug par brtag grang na /
analyzed: ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi zhes bya ba the tshom 'di ci las gyur ce na 'di la bdag med na 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dag na ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams gzugs @245a * // la brten nas 'jug par brtag grang na /
translated: Why does this doubt arise? If there is no self, then in the desire realm and the form realm, mind and mental factors are considered to occur in dependence on form.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni gzugs med pas de na sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni gzugs med pas de na sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo //
translated: But in the formless realm, there is no form, so mind and mental factors would not occur there.

original: the tshom de bzlog pa'i phyir /üîΩder ni ris dang srog la yang //
analyzed: the tshom de bzlog pa'i phyir / der ni ris dang srog la yang //
translated: To eliminate this doubt, the root text states:

original: sems kyi rgyud ni rten pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di smos te /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud ni rten pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di smos te /
translated: There, the mind-stream is supported by class and life.üîΩThe mind-stream is supported by class and life.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni so so'i skye bo nyid dang mi ldan pa dang / thob pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni so so'i skye bo nyid dang mi ldan pa dang / thob pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that the state of an ordinary person, the nonpossession of the factors of ƒÅryas, and the obtainment and arising of the factors of ƒÅryas are also included.

original: stobs chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ci zhig ce na sems kyi rgyun no //
analyzed: stobs chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ci zhig ce na sems kyi rgyun no //
translated: Why? Because the mental continuum is weak.

original: sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun ni gzugs kyi 'du shes dang ma bral ba'i phyir stobs chung ba yin pas gzugs med par mi 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun ni gzugs kyi 'du shes dang ma bral ba'i phyir stobs chung ba yin pas gzugs med par mi 'jug ste /
translated: The mental continuum of sentient beings possessing form is weak because it is not free from the discernment of form. Therefore, it does not enter the formless realm.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la brten nas 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la brten nas 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, it enters the formless realm in dependence on form.

original: de ni ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa de ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ni ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa de ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
translated: Why is that mental continuum strong?

original: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúBecause it arises from the special meditative attainment.‚Äù

original: gzugs dang bral ba'i 'du shes can zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs dang bral ba'i 'du shes can zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúhaving a perception free from form‚Äù means ‚Äúhaving a perception that is free from form.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir de la skyes pa gzugs med pa'i sems kyi rgyun kyang gzugs la mi ltos par 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la skyes pa gzugs med pa'i sems kyi rgyun kyang gzugs la mi ltos par 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, the continuum of mind of one born there is not dependent on form.

original: 'o na ni stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa de kho nas 'jug par 'gyur gyi rten gyis ci zhig bya snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa de kho nas 'jug par 'gyur gyi rten gyis ci zhig bya snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: But if that is so, then the continuum of mind would be generated by the specific meditative attainment itself, because it is powerful, and what would the body do?

original: ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la tshig gi don ni sems can gzugs can rnams kyi ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po dag gzugs la brten pa de ltar gzugs med pa rnams kyis ci la brten zhes byaüîΩba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la tshig gi don ni sems can gzugs can rnams kyi ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po dag gzugs la brten pa de ltar gzugs med pa rnams kyis ci la brten zhes byaüîΩba yin no //
translated: The meaning of the words is this: Just as the class affiliate and life force of sentient beings possessing form are dependent on form, what are the formless dependent on?

original: de gnyis phan tshun du'o zhes bya ba ni ris mthun pa yang srog gi dbang po la brten nas 'jug la srog gi dbang po yang ris mthun pa la brten nas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis phan tshun du'o zhes bya ba ni ris mthun pa yang srog gi dbang po la brten nas 'jug la srog gi dbang po yang ris mthun pa la brten nas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The two are mutually dependent, because the homogeneous character exists in dependence on the faculty of life, and the faculty of life exists in dependence on the homogeneous character.

original: de gnyis kho na phan tshun du ci'i phyir mi rten zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyis ci zhig bya snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis kho na phan tshun du ci'i phyir mi rten zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyis ci zhig bya snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Why don‚Äôt the two just mutually depend on each other? He means to say: What is the use of form?

original: da ni de na zhes bya ba @245b ni gzugs med pa'i khams de na ci'i phyir ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po de dag stobs dang ldan pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: da ni de na zhes bya ba @245b ni gzugs med pa'i khams de na ci'i phyir ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po de dag stobs dang ldan pa de nyid yin no //
translated: Now, in that realm, the homogeneous character and the faculty of life are just powerful.

original: de ni sems kyi rgyud la yang mtshungs te zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud 'di snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pas stobs dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir gnyis la brten nas 'jug par mi 'gyur gyi brten pa med pa kho nar 'jug par 'gyur
analyzed: de ni sems kyi rgyud la yang mtshungs te zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud 'di snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pas stobs dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir gnyis la brten nas 'jug par mi 'gyur gyi brten pa med pa kho nar 'jug par 'gyur
